translation.en: [woman] In March of 1983,
a massive pulse of interstellar cosmic rays
translation.zh: 一束强大的星际宇宙射线

translation.en: struck the earth and its population.
translation.zh: 击中了地球和地球上的人类

translation.en: These cosmic rays triggered a genetic transformation in a select few…
translation.zh: 这种宇宙射线在少数特定人群中触发了基因突变

translation.en: unleashing unimaginable superpowers.
translation.zh: 令他们体内释放出难以想象的超能力

translation.en: Unfortunately, these superpowers were only unlocked in rare individuals,
translation.zh: 不幸的是 只有极少数人的超能力获得了释放

translation.en: who were genetically predisposed to be sociopaths.
translation.zh: 都是那些先天具有反社会人格的人

translation.en: These new superhumans came to be known…
translation.zh: 这些新生代超人类被称为…

translation.en: as Miscreants.
translation.zh: 恶徒

translation.en: What is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不好！

translation.en: My parents were among those caught in the crossfire.
translation.zh: 我父母成了灾难中被殃及的无辜受害者

translation.en: I vowed that day to make it my life's mission to stop the Miscreants.
translation.zh: 那一天 我发誓要倾尽毕生精力阻止恶徒

translation.en: [man] Everything we go over today
translation.zh: 所以 我们今天讲到的知识

translation.en: will be on the test tomorrow. Okay?
translation.zh: 明天考试中都会涉及

translation.en: Lydia, wake up. [knocking on desk]
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 醒醒

translation.en: There she is.
translation.zh: 醒了

translation.en: Uh, sorry, Mr. Emerson.
translation.zh: 对不起 爱默生老师

translation.en: Who can tell me what subject-verb agreement means?
translation.zh: 谁能告诉我 主谓一致是什么意思？

translation.en: Emily, only been in school for one week, hand's always up.
translation.zh: 艾米莉 你来了才一周 每次都举手

translation.en: Let's give someone else a chance.
translation.zh: 也给别的同学一点机会吧

translation.en: Anyone? How about Lydia? Sleeping Beauty back there.
translation.zh: 谁说？莉迪亚？后面的睡美人

translation.en: -Is the answer 11? -Incredibly incorrect.
translation.zh: -答案是11吗？-大错特错 不对

translation.en: No. Anyone else?
translation.zh: -答案是11吗？-大错特错 不对 还有谁？

translation.en: Emily, take it away.
translation.zh: 艾米莉 你来回答

translation.en: Subject-verb agreement means that both the subject and verb must agree in number.
translation.zh: 主谓一致的意思是 主语和动词的单复数必须一致

translation.en: This means both need to be singular or both need to be plural.
translation.zh: 也就是说 它们应该或者都是单数或者都是复数

translation.en: Right again, great.
translation.zh: 又答对了 很好

translation.en: You suck.
translation.zh: 你真烂

translation.en: Wayne, Wayne, I heard it, pal.
translation.zh: 韦恩 我听见了

translation.en: We don't do that. We don't take that kind of guff. Detention.
translation.zh: 我的课堂上不许骂人 你放学后留下

translation.en: -Mr. Emerson, quick question. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -爱默生老师 我有个简单的问题-好

translation.en: So, I can't say, "Wayne is a stupid bags of crap,"
translation.zh: 所以 我不能说“韦恩是一群蠢货”

translation.en: I have to say, "Wayne is a stupid bag of crap"?
translation.zh: 我得说“韦恩是一个蠢货”？

translation.en: Shut up, Lydia.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 莉迪亚

translation.en: Grammatically nailed it, but that's detention.
translation.zh: 语法上来说 你说对了但你也要放学后留下

translation.en: Worth it.
translation.zh: 值了

translation.en: [Mr. Emerson] Verbs and nouns agreeing.
translation.zh: 动词和名词一致

translation.en: [Emily] Stop it.
translation.zh: 住手

translation.en: No. It's not fair your parents got iced by some Miscreants and we're stuck with you.
translation.zh: 不 你爸妈被恶徒干掉了你就赖在我们这里不走 这不公平

translation.en: You think you're so smart. Always showing off in class.
translation.zh: 你以为你很聪明 总是在课堂上显摆

translation.en: Say you're a dork and I'll leave you alone.
translation.zh: 说你是书呆子 我就放过你

translation.en: -Say it. -Say it, nerd!
translation.zh: -说-说啊 呆子！

translation.en: I'm not a nerd. I'm smart. There's a difference.
translation.zh: 我不是书呆子 我很聪明 二者有区别

translation.en: Wayne, got shit in your ears? She didn't wanna say it.
translation.zh: 韦恩 你耳聋吗？她说她不想说

translation.en: She's gonna. Don't think I won't hit a girl, Lydia.
translation.zh: 她非说不可别以为你是女生 我就不敢打你

translation.en: -[kids gasp] -Don't think a girl won't hit you, Wayne.
translation.zh: 别以为我是女生 就不能打你 韦恩

translation.en: Now, get in that dumpster.
translation.zh: 现在 爬进那个垃圾箱

translation.en: -What? Why? -'Cause that's where the garbage goes.
translation.zh: -什么？为什么？-因为垃圾都要进垃圾箱

translation.en: No way!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Do it, dipshit!
translation.zh: 快去 蠢货

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Anyone else want in?
translation.zh: 还有谁想进去？

translation.en: Yeah, you're alright.
translation.zh: 来 没事了

translation.en: -Um, wanna go to the swings? -Okay.
translation.zh: -想去荡秋千吗？-好啊

translation.en: I'm sorry about your parents.
translation.zh: 你父母的事真令人难过

translation.en: If I had superpowers, I'd beat the crap out of whoever did it to them.
translation.zh: 如果我有超能力我一定会把凶手痛揍一顿

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: How cool would it be, though, to be, like, a super person?
translation.zh: 不过 要是能成为一个超人类那该多好啊

translation.en: More like a hero, I guess,
translation.zh: 或者不如说是英雄

translation.en: but I think I'd be a pretty kick-ass superhero.
translation.zh: 或者不如说是英雄 我想我会是一个牛逼的超级英雄

translation.en: My parents were working on a way to turn regular people into superheroes.
translation.zh: 那就是我父母的研究课题 如何把普通人变成超级英雄

translation.en: They were geneticists.
translation.zh: 他们是遗传学家

translation.en: Wait, both of them were lady part doctors?
translation.zh: 他们都是研究怎么生小孩的？

translation.en: No, that's a gynecologist.
translation.zh: 不 你说的是妇科医生

translation.en: Geneticists are scientists who work on genes,
translation.zh: 遗传学家是研究基因的科学家

translation.en: including mutated ones.
translation.zh: 包括变异基因

translation.en: Yeah, I knew that.
translation.zh: 对 我知道

translation.en: I'm testing you.
translation.zh: 我是考考你

translation.en: It would've been cool if they could've turned people to superheroes.
translation.zh: 要是他们能把普通人变成超级英雄那该多好啊

translation.en: I mean, someone's gotta fight against those Miscreants.
translation.zh: 应该有人去打那些恶徒

translation.en: I'm gonna do that someday.
translation.zh: 将来有一天 我要那么做

translation.en: -Do you wanna hang out after school? -Sure.
translation.zh: -放学后一起玩好吗？-好啊

translation.en: -What do you like to do? -Read.
translation.zh: -你喜欢干什么？-看书

translation.en: Oh. You weren't kidding. Okay. [laughs]
translation.zh: 你不是开玩笑啊 好吧

translation.en: -Hey! -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿！-嘿

translation.en: I made us friendship bracelets. Now we're officially friends.
translation.zh: 我给我们做了一对友谊手串现在 我们正式成为朋友了

translation.en: Bet your ass we are.
translation.zh: 地地道道的好朋友

translation.en: [woman] Emily, would you like to say grace?
translation.zh: 艾米莉 你来念祈祷词好吗？ （五年后）

translation.en: Emily?
translation.zh: 艾米莉？

translation.en: Emily Rose Stanton!
translation.zh: 艾米莉罗丝斯坦顿！

translation.en: -I'm… I'm sorry, what? -What are you reading about anyway?
translation.zh: -对不起 什么？-你看什么呢？

translation.en: Weak nuclear force.
translation.zh: 弱核力

translation.en: -I'll say grace. -Thank you, Lydia.
translation.zh: -我来祈祷-谢谢

translation.en: Uh, okay. Uh…
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Thanks, Lord, for making such kick-ass food.
translation.zh: 感谢上帝 赐给我们这么牛逼的美食

translation.en: If Jesus was here, he would crush it.
translation.zh: 如果耶稣在这里 他会都吃光的

translation.en: -[bell rings] -[Lydia] Van Halen's playing Grant Park.
translation.zh: 范海伦乐队今晚在格兰特公园演出

translation.en: There's a break in the fence. I could sneak us in.
translation.zh: 围墙有一段破了我们可以从那里溜进去

translation.en: -I can't. I have a paper due next week. -So?
translation.zh: -我不能去 我下周有篇论文要交-那又怎样？

translation.en: -Knock-knock. -Who's there?
translation.zh: -敲敲门-是谁？

translation.en: -Clyde. -Wait, what?
translation.zh: -克莱德-什么？

translation.en: Wait, I think I told it wrong.
translation.zh: 好像不是这么说的

translation.en: Clyde, if you can't tell a joke, you'll never get a lady. That's factual.
translation.zh: 克莱德 你要是连笑话都不会说那你永远也泡不到女朋友

translation.en: Challenge accepted.
translation.zh: 我接受挑战

translation.en: -Bye, Clyde. -[Lydia] Come on, Em.
translation.zh: -再见 克莱德-去吧 艾米莉

translation.en: Van Halen. It'll be fun.
translation.zh: 是范海伦啊 会很好玩的

translation.en: It would be. But I have to stick to the plan.
translation.zh: 的确会很好玩 但我得遵循计划安排

translation.en: Come on, Emily.
translation.zh: 来吧 艾米莉

translation.en: -There's the girl. Where have you been? -Studying.
translation.zh: -你在这儿啊 你去哪儿了？-我在学习啊

translation.en: -You've been in your cave for weeks. -AP exams in the morning.
translation.zh: -你都闭关好几个礼拜了-明天上午有预修课程考试

translation.en: Super aware of that.
translation.zh: 这我很清楚

translation.en: If I don't get perfect scores, I won't finish what my parents started…
translation.zh: 我要是考不好 就不能完成我父母未完成的工作

translation.en: [both] …and give people power to fight Miscreants.
translation.zh: 赋予人们反抗恶徒的力量

translation.en: I know, I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: But you're gonna do fine. You're gonna crack from the stress though.
translation.zh: 但你会考好的 但你压力太大 会吃不消的所以我来了

translation.en: That's why I'm here.
translation.zh: 但你压力太大 会吃不消的所以我来了

translation.en: How about you get 30 minutes of shut-eye,
translation.zh: 不如你小睡30分钟

translation.en: I'll wake you, and you'll be ready for round two.
translation.zh: 然后我叫醒你你也好精神百倍继续学习啊

translation.en: Don't worry. I got your back. Trust me.
translation.zh: 别担心 有我呢 相信我吧

translation.en: No! Oh my god, I am late. You were supposed to wake me up.
translation.zh: 不好！天呐 我睡过了你应该叫醒我的

translation.en: Oh, wow, that did not go like I planned at all.
translation.zh: 我计划得挺好 没想到会这样

translation.en: I can't do this anymore. I'm trying to do something with my life.
translation.zh: 我不能再这样下去了我不能虚度人生

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry, I messed up.
translation.zh: 对不起 是我搞砸了

translation.en: Sorry isn't enough. I have important things to accomplish.
translation.zh: 对不起也没用我有重要的使命要去完成

translation.en: I can't be stuck in this neighborhood.
translation.zh: 我不能一辈子困在这里

translation.en: -What's wrong with that? -I can't let you drag me down.
translation.zh: -这里怎么了？-我不能让你拖累我

translation.en: Drag you? I'm always looking out for you. I'm the only reason you have any fun.
translation.zh: 我还一直照顾你呢因为我 你的生活才有乐趣

translation.en: I owe it to my parents to be special.
translation.zh: 为了我父母 我一定要出类拔萃

translation.en: We all know I'm not special.
translation.zh: 而我就是个普通人

translation.en: -I didn't say that. -It's fine.
translation.zh: -我没这么说-没关系

translation.en: You don't know how life is gonna go.
translation.zh: 你不知道生活会是什么样

translation.en: I could be the president, getting chauffeured in limousines.
translation.zh: 没准我会当总统到哪儿去都坐豪华专车

translation.en: Come on, come on!
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: You're welcome, double shift.
translation.zh: 不用客气 连上两班

translation.en: Hey, Tito! Quit leaving candy wrappers in my rig!
translation.zh: 蒂托！以后别把糖纸扔在我车上！

translation.en: [officer] Bank robbery in progress. Suspect is a Miscreant.
translation.zh: 有人抢劫银行 疑犯是恶徒

translation.en: [officer] Look for a black pickup truck.
translation.zh: 小心一辆黑色皮卡

translation.en: [silently mouthing] What the f--
translation.zh: 搞什么…

translation.en: Oh my god!
translation.zh: 天呐！

translation.en: [officer] Anyone hurt?
translation.zh: 有人受伤吗？

translation.en: -You guys okay? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你们没事吧？-没事

translation.en: Yeah, who blows up an angel?
translation.zh: 没事？谁会炸天使？

translation.en: God!
translation.zh: 上帝啊！

translation.en: So, what's new, Frank?
translation.zh: 弗兰克 有什么新闻？

translation.en: I got no business.
translation.zh: 没生意

translation.en: People are afraid to… to leave the house. All this fighting, all this crime.
translation.zh: 人们不敢出门 到处打打杀杀这么多犯罪活动

translation.en: The Miscreants are winning, Lydia.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 没人打得过恶徒

translation.en: Tell me about it.
translation.zh: 可不是嘛

translation.en: I can't even pay to fix my window.
translation.zh: 我连修理窗户的钱都没有

translation.en: Well, I'll help you put in a new plate of glass this weekend.
translation.zh: 这周末我帮你换玻璃

translation.en: Just have to… go to this reunion.
translation.zh: 只是得去参加这个同学会

translation.en: Thanks. Um…
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You think Emily will come?
translation.zh: 你认为艾米莉会去吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I don't talk to her anymore, and you know it.
translation.zh: 不知道 我和她没联系 你知道

translation.en: Why don't you call and see if she wants to come?
translation.zh: 为什么不给她打个电话呢问问她要不要来？

translation.en: I wouldn't know how to, even if I wanted to.
translation.zh: 为什么不给她打个电话呢问问她要不要来？ -就算我想联系她 我也不知怎么联系-真的？

translation.en: Oh, really?
translation.zh: -就算我想联系她 我也不知怎么联系-真的？

translation.en: I'm not saying I would. I'm just saying I wouldn't--
translation.zh: 我不是说我要联系 我是说我不会…

translation.en: Norma stopped by a while ago. I got her number for you.
translation.zh: 诺玛刚来过 我替你要来了她的电话

translation.en: Pretty creepy, Frank.
translation.zh: 有点变态

translation.en: Maybe Emily will say no, but you don't know unless you ask.
translation.zh: 也许艾米莉会拒绝但你不问 就永远也不会知道

translation.en: You know, it's like trying to skip a rock in a lake.
translation.zh: 这就像在湖边拿石头打水漂

translation.en: You know the lake's gonna eat it.
translation.zh: 你知道石头会沉入湖底

translation.en: It took you half an hour to find the right flat rock,
translation.zh: 你花了半个小时才找到一块扁平的石头

translation.en: but you gotta throw it.
translation.zh: 但你总得扔扔试试

translation.en: Otherwise, you're not gonna know if it's gonna skip.
translation.zh: 不然你不知道它能不能在水面上跳跃

translation.en: But sure enough, you throw the rock, zing, it goes right into the water.
translation.zh: 于是你把石头扔出去它直接落进水里了

translation.en: Okay, let's go underwater.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就下水吧

translation.en: There's a big salmon swimming by.
translation.zh: 有一条鲑鱼游过来

translation.en: The rock flies in, beans the salmon in the head.
translation.zh: 石头飞过去 正中鲑鱼的脑袋

translation.en: Dead as a doornail. -Floats to the top. -Jesus.
translation.zh: -死翘翘 漂起来了-上帝啊

translation.en: -That's not the worst of it. -Is there more?
translation.zh: -这还不是最遭的-还没完？

translation.en: The salmon's a female.
translation.zh: 那是条雌鲑鱼

translation.en: Loaded with little eggs. Just like the Titanic, they're all dead.
translation.zh: 怀了一肚子鱼子就像泰坦尼克号 全死光了

translation.en: In this, am I the rock, or who's the-- In this situation?
translation.zh: 在你的比喻里 我是那块石头？谁是…

translation.en: You could be the rock,
translation.zh: 你可以是石头

translation.en: you could be the fish,
translation.zh: 你可以是那条鱼

translation.en: you could be the thrower of the stone.
translation.zh: 你可以是扔石头的人

translation.en: -You could be the lake. -Okay.
translation.zh: -你可以是湖-好吧

translation.en: Food for thought.
translation.zh: 值得你思考

translation.en: Or not.
translation.zh: 也许不值得

translation.en: You're bleak, Frank.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 你真够颓的

translation.en: I worry about ya, but you do make a hell of a pancake.
translation.zh: 我为你担心 但是你做的薄饼真好吃

translation.en: -Thanks. -See you tomorrow?
translation.zh: -明天见？-谢谢

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, you be careful out there.
translation.zh: 好 在外面小心点

translation.en: Yeah, you too.
translation.zh: 你也小心点

translation.en: It'd be great if she came, though.
translation.zh: 不过 她要是能来就好了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Emojis.
translation.zh: 表情符

translation.en: You're alright.
translation.zh: 你没事了

translation.en: [quietly] God! Is that the milk?
translation.zh: 老天！是牛奶吗？

translation.en: [quietly] "Nice to hear from you."
translation.zh: “嗨 收到你的短信真高兴”

translation.en: Awesome!
translation.zh: 好极了！

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你猜怎么？

translation.en: Let's thin that out. That'll fix her up.
translation.zh: 我们稀释一下 这样就行了

translation.en: It did not fix her up.
translation.zh: 还是不行

translation.en: Is it the milk or the cereal?
translation.zh: 是牛奶还是麦片？

translation.en: It's the milk.
translation.zh: 是牛奶坏了

translation.en: ♪ Going down The only road I've ever known ♪
translation.zh: （欢迎校友回家）

translation.en: Dang it, Em.
translation.zh: 讨厌 艾米莉

translation.en: [reporter] There's been an assassination attempt on the King,
translation.zh: 人称“国王”的物流大亨 亿万富翁险遭行刺

translation.en: the shipping magnate and billionaire who is opposing Rachel Gonzales
translation.zh: 在即将到来的芝加哥市长选举中他和瑞秋冈萨雷斯

translation.en: -in the upcoming Chicago mayoral race. -Almost every day.
translation.zh: 是竞选对手 -几乎每天都有事-今天早些时候

translation.en: Earlier today, a campaign speech by William "The King" Stevens,
translation.zh: -几乎每天都有事-今天早些时候 “国王”威廉史蒂文斯发表竞选演说时

translation.en: was violently interrupted by an explosive blast from the Miscreant known as Laser.
translation.zh: 遭遇人称“激光女”的恶徒爆炸袭击

translation.en: You're the worst.
translation.zh: 你最邪恶

translation.en: -Right? Isn't she the worst? -…gripped the crowd of supporters.
translation.zh: 是不是？属她最邪恶

translation.en: Immediately after the attack, The King made this statement.
translation.zh: 袭击发生后 国王立即发表了声明

translation.en: You know, I could have lost my life today,
translation.zh: 今天 我差点死掉

translation.en: but I have a message for that Miscreant named Laser.
translation.zh: 但我对那个叫激光女的恶徒有话说

translation.en: You may have taken out this podium, but you will never take out The King.
translation.zh: 你摧毁了这座讲台但你永远无法摧毁国王

translation.en: The King's lead over Miss Gonzales has been reduced to ten points,
translation.zh: 国王对冈萨雷斯女士的领先优势已经缩小到了十个点

translation.en: making this the closest the race has been since both nominees…
translation.zh: 两位候选人之间的差距从没这么小…

translation.en: Come on, Em. Where are you?
translation.zh: 艾米莉 你在哪儿呢？

translation.en: In other news, our city's prodigal daughter, Emily Stanton, has returned,
translation.zh: 离乡远游的艾米莉斯坦顿回到了芝加哥

translation.en: with a new headquarters for her company, Stanton 4.0,
translation.zh: 在本市建立了她的公司新总部斯坦顿4.0

translation.en: right here in downtown Chicago.
translation.zh: 就在芝加哥市中心

translation.en: Way to go, Em.
translation.zh: 干得好啊 艾米莉

translation.en: -Emily's building is epic. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -艾米莉的大楼真棒-是啊

translation.en: No wonder she's not coming to our reunion.
translation.zh: 怪不得她不来参加同学会

translation.en: I wish she was here.
translation.zh: 真希望她能来

translation.en: She's probably hangin' out with strippers, sippin' smooth champagne,
translation.zh: 她可能正和脱衣舞男一起花天酒地呢

translation.en: eatin' nachos filled with goose meat or something.
translation.zh: 吃鹅肉的墨西哥玉米片

translation.en: Clyde, you have a really weird vision of how rich people live.
translation.zh: 克莱德 你对富人生活的想象很奇特

translation.en: Do you wanna hear a joke?
translation.zh: 想听一个笑话吗？

translation.en: -I'm good. -Remember you told me a long time ago,
translation.zh: -不想-记得吗？很久以前你说过

translation.en: "If you can't tell a joke, you won't get a lady." Let me tell one.
translation.zh: “如果不会讲笑话 就泡不到女朋友”听我讲一个吧

translation.en: -Knock-knock. -Who's there?
translation.zh: -敲敲门-是谁？

translation.en: I'm an owl.
translation.zh: 浮云

translation.en: I'm an owl who?
translation.zh: 什么浮云？

translation.en: I botched the owl thing.
translation.zh: 我把浮云的笑话讲坏了

translation.en: I think I'm the owl, and I think…
translation.zh: 我以为我是浮云 我想…

translation.en: Okay, knock-knock.
translation.zh: 好了 敲敲门

translation.en: -Who's there? -I'm an owl.
translation.zh: -是谁？-浮云

translation.en: -I'm an owl, hoo! -I'm an owl who?
translation.zh: -神马浮云！-什么浮云？

translation.en: That can't work because you say that part. Right?
translation.zh: 这样不行 因为这句话是你说的对不对？

translation.en: -Unless we're both owls. -That could be funny. Is that funny?
translation.zh: -除非我们俩都是浮云-那样也很好笑啊 是不是很好笑？

translation.en: -Oh, I got it. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我知道了-好

translation.en: -Knock-knock. -Who's there?
translation.zh: -敲敲门-是谁？

translation.en: I'm an owl. Shut up.
translation.zh: 我是浮云 闭嘴

translation.en: That's it. You don't do the second part.
translation.zh: 后半部分不说了

translation.en: You just break tradition.
translation.zh: 打破传统

translation.en: Okay, cool. Uh…
translation.zh: 好吧 酷

translation.en: I'm gonna go surprise Emily. I'm gonna bring her back here.
translation.zh: 我去给艾米莉一个惊喜 我把她带来

translation.en: -Awesome. -She probably just needs a wingman.
translation.zh: -好极了-她可能需要有人给她壮胆

translation.en: Yeah. I'll be here. I'm gonna crack this nut.
translation.zh: 我留在这儿 我要把这个笑话讲好

translation.en: Okay. If not, that's cool.
translation.zh: 好 讲不好也没关系

translation.en: I'm an owl, who?
translation.zh: 什么浮云？

translation.en: I'm an owl, whose?
translation.zh: 谁的浮云？

translation.en: She's the owl.
translation.zh: 她是浮云

translation.en: Way to go, Em.
translation.zh: 不错啊 艾米莉

translation.en: Whoa! Hey, how you doin'?
translation.zh: 嘿 你好

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi. Uh, I'm here to see Emily Stanton.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨 我来找艾米莉斯坦顿

translation.en: Oh. Sorry, it's after hours. Do you have an appointment?
translation.zh: 对不起 现在下班了 你有预约吗？

translation.en: No. I don't have a… an appointment, but I'm Lydia Berman.
translation.zh: 没有 我没预约 但我是莉迪亚波曼

translation.en: I'm her best friend, so… I mean, we're not currently,
translation.zh: 我是她最好的朋友 所以…我是说我们目前

translation.en: what I would say, "best friends" or "friends."
translation.zh: 不能说是“最好的朋友”或者“朋友”

translation.en: Estranged, I think, puts a stink on it, that it might not warrant.
translation.zh: 我们疏远了 这样说可能不好听可能不能算朋友了

translation.en: But I guess you could say we're estranged now,
translation.zh: 但我猜你也许可以说我们现在是已经疏远了

translation.en: but not in a way that's, like, restraining order.
translation.zh: 但我们之间也并没有禁制令

translation.en: -So, do I just go up and surprise her? -No, you definitely don't do that.
translation.zh: -所以 我能上去给她一个惊喜吗？-绝对不可以

translation.en: Okay, but I'd like to go up and… take her…
translation.zh: 好吧 但我想上去把她带走…

translation.en: not by force,
translation.zh: 不是强行地

translation.en: to her high school reunion.
translation.zh: 带她去高中同学会

translation.en: So, just, you know, Lydia Berman.
translation.zh: 所以 就说是莉迪亚波曼

translation.en: She'll be like, "Cool."
translation.zh: 她会说：“酷”

translation.en: Lydia Berman.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚波曼

translation.en: Hello. There's a Lydia Berman here to see Miss Stanton.
translation.zh: 有个莉迪亚波曼要见斯坦顿女士

translation.en: Says she's here to take her to her high school reunion.
translation.zh: 她说是来带她去参加高中同学会的

translation.en: I'm here to take her--
translation.zh: 我是来带她…

translation.en: -I said that. -She doesn't go to parties on her own.
translation.zh: -我刚说了-她不喜欢单独去参加派对

translation.en: Wow, really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: That is surprising to hear. I will send her up.
translation.zh: 没想到 我这就让她上去

translation.en: Well, she will see you. I'm kinda relieved that's the answer.
translation.zh: -她可以见你了-这个答复让我松了一口气

translation.en: Not how I thought that one was gonna go.
translation.zh: 我也没想到会是这样的结果

translation.en: -Thanks, man. Hi. -[woman] Hello.
translation.zh: 谢谢 -你好-嗨

translation.en: Miss Berman. Hi, I'm Jessie.
translation.zh: 波曼女士 我是杰西

translation.en: Hi. You can just call me Lydia. It's my name.
translation.zh: 你好 叫我莉迪亚就行了这是我的名字

translation.en: Whoa, this place is taters.
translation.zh: 这地方太酷了

translation.en: Look at this thing.
translation.zh: 看看这东西

translation.en: Goes all the way-- I mean, how do you change a bulb in something like that?
translation.zh: 这么高 你们怎么换灯泡啊？

translation.en: Uh, that would be a maintenance question.
translation.zh: 这是个关于大厦维护的问题

translation.en: Maintenance. There you go. Wow.
translation.zh: 维护 对

translation.en: Well, Miss Stanton is working at the moment,
translation.zh: 斯坦顿女士正在工作但她很快就会过来的

translation.en: but she should be available momentarily. Is there anything I can get?
translation.zh: 斯坦顿女士正在工作但她很快就会过来的 你想来点什么？

translation.en: Can I get, like, an ice-cold brewski?
translation.zh: 我能来杯冰啤酒吗？

translation.en: It's just gonna take the edge off, 'cause I'm kinda, like, clammy…
translation.zh: 也许能让我放松一点 我有点冒汗…

translation.en: -Clamming out, if you get me, so… -Okay.
translation.zh: -汗津津的 也许你懂的 所以…-好的

translation.en: Ah, thank you, Jessie.
translation.zh: 谢谢 杰西

translation.en: [Emily] Hey, Lydi. Good to see you.
translation.zh: 嘿 莉迪亚 见到你真高兴

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Long time, huh?
translation.zh: 好久不见啊

translation.en: Yeah, it sure has been.
translation.zh: 可不是么

translation.en: -You look good. -Oh.
translation.zh: 你看起来不错

translation.en: Thanks. Yeah, you look, I mean, super classy.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你看起来真是超有型

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So, uh…
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: what brings you by?
translation.zh: 什么风把你吹来了？

translation.en: Well, I-- You know, we were texting, and… I mean, I texted you,
translation.zh: 我 你知道 我们那天互发短信…我是说 我给你发过短信

translation.en: and then you… you wrote back about the reunion,
translation.zh: 然后你回了短信 关于同学会的事

translation.en: which was, is, tonight.
translation.zh: 就是今晚

translation.en: And I was there, and you hadn't gotten there yet, so I…
translation.zh: 我刚才在那边 你一直没去 所以我…

translation.en: I remembered that you never liked to go to parties solo, so I just thought I'd…
translation.zh: 我记得你从不喜欢一个人去参加派对所以我想我…

translation.en: thought I'd swing by and see if you wanted me to go with you.
translation.zh: 我想来一趟看看你想不想让我陪你去

translation.en: Was that tonight?
translation.zh: 就是今晚？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, Lydia.
translation.zh: 对不起 莉迪亚

translation.en: I… I can't go to the reunion. I… I got caught up with work.
translation.zh: 我不能去同学会 工作抽不出身啊

translation.en: Oh, well, yeah, I bet. I mean, look at all this stuff.
translation.zh: 哦 当然 看这些玩意儿

translation.en: It's like, "Beam me up, Scotty." Beep, beep, bop.
translation.zh: “斯科蒂 把我传送上去”

translation.en: You know, I don't know what any of it does, but-- [gasps]
translation.zh: 我不知道这些东西都是干什么用的但是…

translation.en: Oh god. I'm so sorry. Oh my god, this sweater's probably so expensive.
translation.zh: 天呐 真对不起 这件毛衫可能贵得很

translation.en: It's okay. I'll just change.
translation.zh: 没关系 我换换就是了

translation.en: -I don't wanna ruin your shirt. -No, this shirt's, like, garbage.
translation.zh: -我不希望你的衬衫被毁了-不 这件衬衫就是垃圾

translation.en: Literally, I found it in the garbage, so I don't…
translation.zh: 真的 我在垃圾堆里捡的 所以我不…

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -Oh.
translation.zh: 真对不起

translation.en: I'll, uh, pay for dry cleaning--
translation.zh: 干洗的钱我来出

translation.en: No, no, no. I couldn't take your money.
translation.zh: 不 我不能接受你的钱

translation.en: But could you do me a favor and, um…
translation.zh: 但我想拜托你…

translation.en: ooh, don't touch anything, uh, while I'm gone, please.
translation.zh: 我离开的时候 请不要碰任何东西

translation.en: -Yeah, what a-- -Not… not even… not even that.
translation.zh: -好的 真是…-这桌子也不要碰

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay?
translation.zh: -好-好吗？

translation.en: I speaken ze English.
translation.zh: 我完全明白

translation.en: [Emily chuckles] Jessie!
translation.zh: 杰西！

translation.en: I need you to keep an eye on things.
translation.zh: 我需要你替我看着点

translation.en: Oh, uh, she said that you're supposed to get me another cold beer right away.
translation.zh: 她说要你立刻再给我拿一杯冰啤酒

translation.en: Seemed kind of, like, mad. I think at you.
translation.zh: 她好像挺生气 对你

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Alright, I'm… I'm on it. Anything else?
translation.zh: 好 我去拿 还要什么？

translation.en: -No, you're so sweet. -Okay.
translation.zh: -不用了 你真是好人-好的

translation.en: [muttering quietly] Stupid.
translation.zh: 真蠢

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: Whoa. What is all this?
translation.zh: 这都是什么啊？

translation.en: Alright, remember, Lydia, you said you would not touch anything, so…
translation.zh: 记住 莉迪亚 你说过你什么也不会碰所以…

translation.en: you should not.
translation.zh: 你不应该碰

translation.en: What do you do?
translation.zh: 你是干什么的？

translation.en: Ooh, it's like old-school Atari.
translation.zh: 这好像老式雅达利游戏机啊

translation.en: -Let's see what she's got. Oh. -[device powering up]
translation.zh: 我们看看她有什么

translation.en: It's a light switch. Pft. Big deal.
translation.zh: 灯的开关啊 有什么了不起

translation.en: Alright, I'm gonna sit, not touch anything else, and wait for my beer. [grunts]
translation.zh: 好吧 我这就坐下 不再碰任何东西等我的啤酒

translation.en: No! Ow! Ow!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Whoa! This is the world's stupidest massage chair!
translation.zh: 这是世界上最蠢的按摩椅！

translation.en: It's not a massage chair, you idiot.
translation.zh: 这不是按摩椅 你这傻瓜

translation.en: There has been a breach in the injection room.
translation.zh: 有人擅闯注射室

translation.en: -Get me out of here! -Dear god, Lydia. What have you done?
translation.zh: -让我下去！-天呐 莉迪亚 你干了什么？

translation.en: Emily, I didn't touch anything!
translation.zh: 艾米莉 我什么也没碰！好吧 我碰了几个…

translation.en: [spluttering] Okay, I touched a couple-- I touched one thing. I'm so sorry…
translation.zh: 艾米莉 我什么也没碰！好吧 我碰了几个… 我碰了一个东西 对不起

translation.en: [Emily, echoing] Twenty years of research down the drain. How could you leave her alone in the lab?
translation.zh: 20年的研究付诸东流 你怎么能把她一个人留在实验室？

translation.en: [Jessie] She said you wanted me to get her another beer. I'm sorry, Miss Stanton.
translation.zh: 她说你让我再给她拿杯啤酒斯坦顿女士

translation.en: Lydia, do you have any idea what you've done?
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 你知道你干了些什么吗？

translation.en: I've worked for this my entire life and you've ruined everything.
translation.zh: 这是我一辈子的心血 全被你毁了

translation.en: Oh, I don't know what was in those needles,
translation.zh: 我不知道那些针管里是什么

translation.en: but I'm totally happy to give it back to you.
translation.zh: 但我很乐意还给你

translation.en: I can, like, pee in a cup or something--
translation.zh: 我可以对着杯子撒泡尿 或者…

translation.en: You don't understand.
translation.zh: 你不明白

translation.en: Tonight, I was going to begin treatments I've been working on my whole life.
translation.zh: 我用毕生精力开发了一种机体改造方案 正要实施

translation.en: I developed a genetic sequencing platform
translation.zh: 这是一种基因测序平台

translation.en: that can alter a human's biochemistry in unimaginable ways.
translation.zh: 能以难以想象的方式改造人的生物化学属性

translation.en: I finally finished the work my parents started.
translation.zh: 我终于完成了我父母的工作

translation.en: I was going to find a way to stop the Miscreants.
translation.zh: 我本来会找到打败恶徒的办法

translation.en: I was going to become a super… person.
translation.zh: 我本来会成为一个超… 人

translation.en: That is awesome, Em.
translation.zh: 太好了 艾米莉

translation.en: I always knew you could do it.
translation.zh: 我一直相信你能做到

translation.en: What's your power?
translation.zh: 你的超能力是什么？

translation.en: They were supposed to be super strength and invisibility,
translation.zh: 本来应该是超强力量和隐身

translation.en: but you took her treatment for strength.
translation.zh: 但她实现超强力量的第一剂药被你用掉了

translation.en: I'm really, really sorry. I didn't… I didn't mean to…
translation.zh: 真是太对不起了 我不是有意的

translation.en: Maybe you can just, like, cook up another batch.
translation.zh: 真是太对不起了 我不是有意的 也许你可以再做一份

translation.en: It took five years to create that formula,
translation.zh: 这个配方用了五年才做出来

translation.en: and more importantly,
translation.zh: 更重要的是

translation.en: your body's undergoing a molecular change from the injections.
translation.zh: 注射之后 你的身体已经开始发生分子层面的变化了

translation.en: Your cardiovascular system has been increased by 1,000%.
translation.zh: 你的心血管系统增强了百分之一千

translation.en: It's how those intense boils on your face have already healed themselves.
translation.zh: 所以你脸上的严重烫伤才能这么快自愈

translation.en: Lydia, the process has started.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 改造过程已经开始了

translation.en: Well, that's not… very soothing to hear.
translation.zh: 这话听起来有些令人不安啊

translation.en: I mean, I feel weird and sweaty, and…
translation.zh: 我感觉怪怪的 浑身冒汗

translation.en: my heart's poundin' like a jackhammer inside my chest because of this serum.
translation.zh: 我的心脏咚咚地狂跳这都是因为那药水

translation.en: -What does that mean? -If you stop taking the treatments,
translation.zh: -这意味着什么呢？-如果你不继续接受药物注射

translation.en: your veins will shred like a log in a wood chipper.
translation.zh: 你的血管就会粉碎像木头扔进粉碎机里一样

translation.en: Jessie, could you report to security?
translation.zh: 杰西 请你去保安部一下

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Emily, the only logical thing to do is stay the course.
translation.zh: 艾米莉 唯一符合逻辑的选择就是继续做下去

translation.en: We'll continue with the super strength treatments with the village idiot here
translation.zh: 我们继续给这个乡下白痴实施超强力量的改造

translation.en: and you begin the treatments for invisibility.
translation.zh: 你开始接受隐身能力的改造

translation.en: "Village idiot?"
translation.zh: “乡下白痴？”

translation.en: Hello, Chicago is a city, not a village, and the best city in the world.
translation.zh: 芝加哥可是个城市啊 不是乡下而且是全世界最好的城市

translation.en: -The Bears, the Cubs-- -Not the time, Lydia.
translation.zh: -芝加哥熊队、芝加哥小熊队…-现在不是时候

translation.en: -There is no other way, is there? -No, Emily. You know that.
translation.zh: -没有别的办法 对吧？-没有 艾米莉

translation.en: -Em, let's show you to your room. -Wait a minute, I'm not staying here.
translation.zh: -我们带你去你的房间-等等 我不能住在这里

translation.en: I've got stuff to do. I got work on Monday. I've got good Bulls tickets.
translation.zh: 我还有事 周一还要上班我还买了公牛队的球票

translation.en: If you stop the treatments,
translation.zh: 如果中止改造进程

translation.en: it's entirely possible that your body will violently explode over the weekend.
translation.zh: 很可能你的身体在本周末就会爆炸

translation.en: I can take a peek at a room, you know.
translation.zh: 看看我的房间也可以

translation.en: This looks like the jail cell on Battlestar Galactica.
translation.zh: 好像《太空堡垒卡拉狄加》里面的牢房啊

translation.en: -Alright, come on, come on, come on. -Alright.
translation.zh: -好了 进来吧-好

translation.en: The room is furnished in a non-distracting manner to help with your recovery.
translation.zh: 房间的布置采用无干扰家居模式有助于你的康复

translation.en: Somebody tell me who Urkel is.
translation.zh: 谁来告诉我厄蔻尔是谁？

translation.en: -What's an Urkel? -Not "what's," "who's" an Urkel.
translation.zh: -厄蔻尔是什么？-厄蔻尔不是“什么” 厄蔻尔是“谁”？

translation.en: It's Urkel's… Urkel. Tell her who Urkel is.
translation.zh: 就是厄蔻尔…告诉她厄蔻尔是谁

translation.en: How do you not-- Oh my god.
translation.zh: 你们怎么会不…天呐

translation.en: You got glasses and suspenders, you know, and you seem super smart.
translation.zh: 你戴眼镜 穿背带裤 你好像超级聪明

translation.en: -Let me search. -You know who Urkel is.
translation.zh: -我搜一下-你知道厄蔻尔是谁

translation.en: -How do you spell that? -You spell it Ur-kel.
translation.zh: -怎么拼写？-厄 蔻尔

translation.en: [imitating Urkel] "Did I do that?"
translation.zh: 开玩笑吗？“这是我干的？”

translation.en: Right? Does that ring a-- "Did I do that?"
translation.zh: 对吧？想起来没…“这是我干的吗？”

translation.en: "Did I do that?" You know that.
translation.zh: “这是我干的吗？” 你知道啊

translation.en: "Did I… did I do that?"
translation.zh: “这是我干的吗？”

translation.en: Mom, is she having a reaction to the injection?
translation.zh: 妈妈这是接受注射后的不良反应吗？

translation.en: No, she's always like this.
translation.zh: 不是 她一直这样

translation.en: Did you say "Mom"?
translation.zh: 你说“妈妈”？

translation.en: "Mom"? You have a ki-- You…
translation.zh: “妈妈”？你有个小…你…

translation.en: You have a kid and I didn't even know it?
translation.zh: 你有小孩 我都不知道？

translation.en: -You have a secret kid for 20 years? -I'm only 15.
translation.zh: -20年来 你偷偷摸摸地有个女儿？-我才15岁

translation.en: Well, I don't know that 'cause she never told me!
translation.zh: 我不知道啊 因为她从没告诉我！

translation.en: We don't have time for any of this.
translation.zh: 我们没时间说这些

translation.en: What is Jodie Foster's problem? Allie helped me set up this whole lab.

translation.zh: -你假装的吧？-是的

translation.en: You are the worst.
translation.zh: 你太差劲了

translation.en: I have been wondering, if it's none of my beeswax you can just tell me,
translation.zh: 我一直在想 如果这不关我的事 你也可以直说但是…

translation.en: but… where's Tracy's dad?
translation.zh: 如果这不关我的事 你也可以直说但是… 特蕾西的爸爸在哪儿？

translation.en: Well, I was dating a fellow researcher at Yale.
translation.zh: 在耶鲁大学时 我和一个一起做研究的同事约会

translation.en: And I suppose the romance involved in the deep dive
translation.zh: 也许 我们深入研究鲍维里-萨顿染色体学说时

translation.en: into Boveri-Sutton chromosome theory was too much for us to take.
translation.zh: 擦出了火花由此产生了我们无法承受的后果

translation.en: Oh, sexy science talk.
translation.zh: 科学家的风情话

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 嗯…

translation.en: when he found out about the baby, he didn't want any part of it.
translation.zh: 他知道我怀孕了 不想要这个孩子

translation.en: Well, his loss.
translation.zh: 那是他的损失

translation.en: Tracy is an awesome kid.
translation.zh: 特蕾西是个好孩子

translation.en: Thanks. She is.
translation.zh: 谢谢 的确如此

translation.en: Cooldown's over, guys. Let's get back to it.
translation.zh: 休息时间结束 我们继续吧

translation.en: "Get back"? We've been doing it for two and a half hours. Thought we were done.
translation.zh: “继续”？我们练了两个半小时了我以为我们练完了呢

translation.en: Let's make a run.
translation.zh: 我们溜走吧

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的？-对

translation.en: -[bass-heavy rock] -Oh my god, Miscreants! Look out!
translation.zh: 天呐 恶徒来啦！小心！

translation.en: -Go, go, go. -[Emily] I told you I was fun.
translation.zh: -快-我说了 我很风趣的

translation.en: Alright. You do whatever you gotta do, Tony.
translation.zh: （训练 第23天） 好吧 你想怎样就怎样吧我看有点夸张

translation.en: Seems like overkill to me.
translation.zh: 好吧 你想怎样就怎样吧我看有点夸张

translation.en: Could be. Let's do this.
translation.zh: 也许 我们来吧

translation.en: Oh man. Tony. I'm sorry, man. I'm just…
translation.zh: 哎呀 托尼 真对不起 我只是…

translation.en: I'm still trying to get the hang of this strength thing. You okay?
translation.zh: 我还不太会控制我的力量你没事吧？

translation.en: I'm good.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: Man.
translation.zh: 哎呀

translation.en: Well, I guess the injections are working 'cause I keep hurtin' Tony.
translation.zh: 我看这些注射起作用了因为我不断让托尼受伤

translation.en: Pill time, Mom.
translation.zh: 服药时间到 妈妈

translation.en: Oh, thank you, honey.
translation.zh: 谢谢 亲爱的

translation.en: I keep seeing you taking these pills,
translation.zh: 我总是看见你吃药

translation.en: but are we ever going to see some action, or should I say,
translation.zh: 但我们什么时候能看见你小试身手呢？或者说

translation.en: "Are we ever going to not see some action?"
translation.zh: “什么时候我们能看不见你小试身手呢？”

translation.en: -You didn't tell her? -Tell me what?
translation.zh: -你没告诉她？-告诉我什么？

translation.en: That was my last pill.
translation.zh: 刚才那是我最后一次服药

translation.en: Are you kidding? I've had, like, thirty-five billion injections in my face
translation.zh: 开玩笑吗？我的脸被针扎了十万八千次

translation.en: and you've just been taking a handful of pills.
translation.zh: 你不过吃了几颗药丸

translation.en: Do you feel any different? Are they working?
translation.zh: 你有什么不一样的感觉吗？有效吗？

translation.en: Well, let's see.
translation.zh: 我们试试看

translation.en: Oh, Em, say something, you're freaking me out.
translation.zh: 艾米莉 说句话 你把我吓坏了

translation.en: You gotta say something, Emily. I can't…
translation.zh: 你得说点什么 艾米莉 我不能…

translation.en: Alright. Where are you? We're gonna put a bell on you.
translation.zh: 好吧 你在哪儿？我们得给你拴个铃铛了

translation.en: Just make a noise.
translation.zh: 出点声

translation.en: Em, say something. Oh!
translation.zh: 艾米莉 说句话

translation.en: You know what? Respect me.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 你要尊重我

translation.en: -[Lydia] Uh-uh. -[Tracy] Wait, Lydia. Come back.
translation.zh: 等等 莉迪亚 别走

translation.en: Welcome to the carnival, bitch!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到嘉年华 贱人！

translation.en: Oh!
translation.zh: （训练 第33天）

translation.en: I am all powerful!
translation.zh: 我力大无穷！

translation.en: Hit it high! There you go!
translation.zh: 击掌庆祝！好极了！

translation.en: Bill!
translation.zh: 比尔！

translation.en: Maybe if we don't look at her, she'll stop.
translation.zh: 如果我们都不看她也许她就会停下来

translation.en: -[Lydia] Look out! -We're past that point.
translation.zh: -小心！-早过了那个阶段了

translation.en: Hello, Chicago!
translation.zh: 你好 芝加哥！

translation.en: Hey, Tony, I swear I'm not gunning for you, man.
translation.zh: 嘿 托尼我发誓 我不是对着你发炮的

translation.en: I'm good.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: -Grab another cup. -[Lydia] He's alright.
translation.zh: -又拿了一只杯子-他没事

translation.en: I'd say your training is done.
translation.zh: 我觉得你的训练结束了

translation.en: -What do you mean, officially? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -什么意思？正式结束？-对

translation.en: -Can I take this off? -You haven't needed that for weeks.
translation.zh: -我能把这个去掉吗？-你头几周就已不再需要它了

translation.en: Shady.
translation.zh: 阴险啊

translation.en: I got you something.
translation.zh: 给你一个礼物

translation.en: If you're done training, I can show you the new suits.
translation.zh: 我可以带你们看看你们的新战斗服

translation.en: Now that we have these things, we need super names.
translation.zh: 现在装备也有了 我们需要有个超级英雄的名号

translation.en: Ooh, what's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Oh, I've been decorating for ya.
translation.zh: 我在帮你搞装修

translation.en: You know what? I think my super name is gonna be The Hammer.
translation.zh: 我觉得我的名号不如就叫“大锤”

translation.en: But, Lydia, you don't carry a hammer.
translation.zh: 但是莉迪亚 你又不是抡大锤的

translation.en: -We don't have to be so literal. -Can't I just be Emily?
translation.zh: -没必要那么较真儿啊-我就叫艾米莉不行吗？

translation.en: God. Nobody wants to get saved by somebody named Emily.
translation.zh: 没有人想被一个叫艾米莉的人拯救

translation.en: Oh, I got it. You're Bingo.
translation.zh: 我知道了 你叫宾果

translation.en: That makes zero sense.
translation.zh: 不知所云

translation.en: It's a catchphrase and a name all in one neat, little package.
translation.zh: 这既是一句口头禅 也是你的名字二合一套装

translation.en: You can say, "Bingo! I go invisible."
translation.zh: 你可以说：“宾果 我隐身”

translation.en: [scoffs] That just… I don't know. It just reminds me of the dog Bingo.
translation.zh: 这太…我不知道它让我想起那条叫宾果的狗

translation.en: It's not a dog, Bingo.
translation.zh: 宾果不是狗

translation.en: I mean, are you thinking "Zorro"?
translation.zh: 你是说佐罗吗？

translation.en: ♪ Zorro was his name-o ♪
translation.zh: 佐罗就是他的名字哟

translation.en: -That's not correct. -We gotta think of a team name.
translation.zh: -不对-我们得想一个团队名号

translation.en: You know what we need? We need a little snack break,
translation.zh: 你知道我们需要什么吗？我们需要休息一下 吃些点心

translation.en: get our brain juices going again.
translation.zh: 补充一下脑汁

translation.en: See, I can talk science, too. Let's go grab a snack.
translation.zh: 你看 我也会说科技黑话我们去吃点零食吧

translation.en: Here we go. Crater Joe.
translation.zh: 这样吧 “弹坑乔”

translation.en: Uh, Flapjack Crackers. Thunder Force.
translation.zh: 烤脆饼 雷霆女神

translation.en: Mango flops. Did I just do it? Yeah.
translation.zh: 芒果拖鞋 我是不是想出来了？没错

translation.en: -Mango Flops? -What? No. Thunder Force.
translation.zh: -芒果拖鞋？-什么？不 雷霆女神

translation.en: That sounds kind of dude-ish.
translation.zh: 听起来有点傻

translation.en: Everything sounds stupid the first time you hear it.
translation.zh: 所有名字第一次听的时候都有点傻

translation.en: Also, you can't say it like… [mumbles] "Thunder Force."
translation.zh: 而且 你不能这么说“雷霆女神”

translation.en: I didn't say "Thunder Force."
translation.zh: 我没说“雷霆女神”

translation.en: Then say it with something behind it, and louder. Like Thunder Force.
translation.zh: 你要理直气壮 声如洪钟地说雷霆女神

translation.en: -Thunder Force! -Right. Thunder Force.
translation.zh: -雷霆女神！-对 雷霆女神

translation.en: Thunder Force!
translation.zh: 雷霆女神！

translation.en: See? Try it.
translation.zh: -我喜欢-怎么样？你试试

translation.en: [loudly] Thunder Force!
translation.zh: 雷霆女神！

translation.en: You don't say… [mumbles] "1985, the Chicago Bears."
translation.zh: 你不会说：“1985年 芝加哥熊队”

translation.en: You say… [loudly] "1985, the Chicago Bears won the Super Bowl
translation.zh: 你说：“1985年芝加哥熊队赢得超级碗

translation.en: and created one of the best albums slash singles ever,
translation.zh: 还创造了史上最牛的专辑和单曲

translation.en: -which was The Super Bowl Shuffle." -"The Chicago Bears."
translation.zh: -那就是《超级碗舞步》-“芝加哥熊队”

translation.en: William "The Fridge" Perry.
translation.zh: “冰箱”威廉佩里

translation.en: I loved him.
translation.zh: 我好喜欢他

translation.en: Jim McMahon had eye issues and he wore glasses.
translation.zh: 吉姆麦克马洪眼睛有毛病 戴眼镜

translation.en: He would take off the sunglasses, there would be magic.
translation.zh: 他会摘下墨镜 就会有魔力

translation.en: ♪ We're not here To cause real trouble ♪
translation.zh: 我们不是来找麻烦的

translation.en: ♪ We're here to do The Super Bowl Shuffle ♪
translation.zh: 我们是来跳超级碗的舞步

translation.en: Ah! We're getting off-topic. Can you just say "Thunder Force"?
translation.zh: 我们跑题了 你能不能大声说“雷霆女神”？

translation.en: -Thunder Force. -Thunder Force!
translation.zh: -雷霆女神-雷霆女神！

translation.en: Allie wants us in the garage.
translation.zh: 艾丽让我们去车库

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 我靠

translation.en: Language.
translation.zh: 注意语言

translation.en: -Can I say something? -Absolutely not.
translation.zh: -我能不能说句话？-绝对不行

translation.en: This car makes me ovulate.
translation.zh: 这台车让我爱得排卵了

translation.en: I wanna have shiny, purple Lamborghini babies.
translation.zh: 我想生几个锃亮的紫色兰博基尼宝宝

translation.en: I knew I didn't wanna hear it.
translation.zh: 我就知道狗嘴里吐不出象牙

translation.en: Right, get in. We don't have much time.
translation.zh: 上车吧 我们时间不多了

translation.en: -For what? -For your first mission.
translation.zh: -什么事？-你们的第一次任务

translation.en: Shotgun!
translation.zh: 我坐副驾！

translation.en: -[Emily] That's not what shotgun means. -Oh my god.
translation.zh: -你知道什么叫副驾吗？-上帝啊

translation.en: It's so cool, I can't even get the door open.
translation.zh: 太酷了 我连门都打不开

translation.en: -No. I'll open it for you. -[car beeps]
translation.zh: 我给你们开

translation.en: The push-start key is in your suit.
translation.zh: 一键启动钥匙在你战衣里

translation.en: Oh boy. That's…
translation.zh: 哎哟 真是…

translation.en: [Emily] Haven't really driven this one.
translation.zh: 还真没开过这台车

translation.en: [Lydia] How can you have it and not drive it?
translation.zh: 你的车 你怎么会没开过？

translation.en: Are they getting in that slowly on purpose?
translation.zh: 她们故意那么慢吞吞地上车吗？

translation.en: -Oh boy. That's intimidating. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -哎哟 真让人紧张-是啊

translation.en: Maybe squeeze. Squeeze together.
translation.zh: 挤一挤 互相挤挤

translation.en: [Lydia] We look awesome?
translation.zh: 我们是不是帅极了？

translation.en: Oh my god.
translation.zh: 上帝啊

translation.en: Thunder Force!
translation.zh: 雷霆女神！

translation.en: You look good.
translation.zh: 你们太帅了

translation.en: -[tires screech] -[Allie] Well, Thunder Force…
translation.zh: 雷霆女神…

translation.en: -Good name. -It's a kickass name.
translation.zh: -这名字不错-是个极品的名字

translation.en: For the last six months,
translation.zh: 过去六个月

translation.en: the South Side has been rampaged by a Miscreant named The Crab,
translation.zh: 南城一直遭受恶徒“螃蟹”的荼毒

translation.en: who, with his crew, has been robbing stores almost daily.
translation.zh: 他和他的同伙几乎每天抢劫店铺

translation.en: Tonight, they're hitting a liquor store on Clark Street.
translation.zh: 今天晚上 他们要抢克拉克街的一家卖酒商店

translation.en: The Crab? What's his power?
translation.zh: 螃蟹？他有什么超能力？

translation.en: Like, tasting delicious with melted butter?
translation.zh: 蘸着融化的黄油很好吃？

translation.en: Alright, Thunder Force.
translation.zh: 好 雷霆女神

translation.en: -It's time to do what you were made to do. -Wow.
translation.zh: 你们就是为了这一刻而生的

translation.en: -My heart's really racing. -Oh boy.
translation.zh: -我的心在狂跳-哎哟

translation.en: Now that we're going into a possible physical altercation, I'm…
translation.zh: 我们可能真的要去和人打架了…

translation.en: feeling my stress rising.
translation.zh: 我好紧张

translation.en: -Mom, open the glove compartment. -Why?
translation.zh: -妈妈 请打开手套箱-为什么？

translation.en: I wanted you to be safe out there. I developed a high-powered taser for you.
translation.zh: 我希望你在外面平安无事 所以我为你制造了一把高能电击枪

translation.en: [Lydia] Oh, taters.
translation.zh: 哦 太好了

translation.en: That looks awesome!
translation.zh: 看起来棒极了！

translation.en: Due to the electrical charge it imparts, you'll become visible when you use it.
translation.zh: 使用时会产生强大电流 所以我认为你用的时候会显形

translation.en: Good to know. It looks powerful.
translation.zh: 很重要的信息 看起来很厉害啊

translation.en: What setting should I use?
translation.zh: 我应该用哪一档？

translation.en: Maybe five or six?
translation.zh: 也许五档 六档？

translation.en: I'd turn it all the way up.
translation.zh: 要是我就开最高档

translation.en: You don't want to kinda tase somebody
translation.zh: 要电人就狠狠地电

translation.en: and then they conk you in the melon or something.
translation.zh: 免得他们缓醒过来揍你

translation.en: -Sounds right to me. -[taser whirs]
translation.zh: 言之有理

translation.en: -Oh. -Look at us.
translation.zh: 看看我们啊

translation.en: Thunder Force.
translation.zh: 雷霆女神

translation.en: We did, Em. We're… we're a super team.
translation.zh: 我们成功了 我们是超级英雄组合

translation.en: Just like we used to talk about when we were kids.
translation.zh: 就像我们小时候坐在秋千上畅想的一样

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Let's go kick some Miscreant butt.
translation.zh: 我们去揍那些恶徒

translation.en: -We need pump-up music. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -我们需要点激昂的音乐-对

translation.en: Let's get pumped with awesome pump-up music.
translation.zh: 让我们放点激昂的音乐 热血沸腾吧

translation.en: Let's get pumped!
translation.zh: 热血沸腾！

translation.en: Is this… Glenn Frey?
translation.zh: 这是…格林弗莱？

translation.en: In my life, every day is Frey-day.
translation.zh: 我生活中天天听弗莱的歌

translation.en: "Smuggler's Blues." It kicks butt and it's getting us pumped.
translation.zh: 《走私者的布鲁斯》很牛 而且让我们热血沸腾

translation.en: Is it?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: It was number one on the charts for 11 weeks, Lydia.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 这首歌连续11周占据排行榜榜首呢

translation.en: I'm not saying I don't love Glenn Frey. I love Frey.
translation.zh: 我没说我不喜欢格林弗莱我喜欢弗莱

translation.en: But… there's a time and a place for Frey.
translation.zh: 但听弗莱的歌也要分场合分时候

translation.en: Mom, please don't sing into your taser.
translation.zh: 妈妈 不要对着电击枪唱歌

translation.en: You could let Lydia sing into it.
translation.zh: 你可以让莉迪亚对着它唱

translation.en: This is it. Pull over.
translation.zh: 到了 停车

translation.en: -I'm gonna barf. -You gotta learn to ride the lightning.
translation.zh: -天呐 我要吐了-你得学会如何风驰电掣

translation.en: Be careful, Mom.
translation.zh: 小心 妈妈

translation.en: You know I will.
translation.zh: 你知道我会小心的

translation.en: -Let's do this. -It's go time.
translation.zh: -我们上-开始了

translation.en: -We've gotta rethink this car. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们得重新考虑一下座驾的问题-对

translation.en: Thunder Force, earpieces in. Do you copy?
translation.zh: 雷霆女神 耳机接通了 能听到吗？

translation.en: I copy.
translation.zh: 听到了

translation.en: Let's go in the back. Time to go incognito, Bingo.
translation.zh: -我们从后门进去-宾果 隐身吧

translation.en: -That's not my name. -I dunno how you don't love that name.
translation.zh: 我不叫宾果 我不明白你为什么不喜欢这个名字

translation.en: -Are you still here? -[Emily] Yes.
translation.zh: -你还在吗？-在

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: -I was behind-- -You were in front!
translation.zh: -我在你后面-我以为你在我前面呢！

translation.en: [man] Hurry up, go.
translation.zh: 快点 别磨蹭

translation.en: Everyone just stay calm and no one's gonna get hurt.
translation.zh: 大家保持镇静 就不会有人受伤

translation.en: Hey, big time. Don't hit that button. It's super loud.
translation.zh: 嘿 大个子 别按那按钮 很吵的

translation.en: It's the fifth time this year. Rob someone else.
translation.zh: 今年都第五次了 抢抢别人行吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'd love less whining.
translation.zh: 少些抱怨

translation.en: We're gonna rob everyone. Put money in the bag.
translation.zh: 今晚我们挨家挨户地抢 把钱装袋里

translation.en: [Lydia] Hold it, Calamari.
translation.zh: 别动 海鲜

translation.en: -This robbery's being stopped by Thunder-- -[gunshots]
translation.zh: 抢劫到此为止 我们是雷霆…

translation.en: Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: -Em, are you okay? -I'm okay.
translation.zh: -艾米莉 你没事吧-我没事

translation.en: No, he's headed right toward us.
translation.zh: 不好 他冲我们走过来了

translation.en: Who said that?
translation.zh: 谁在说话？

translation.en: Em?
translation.zh: 艾米莉？

translation.en: -I'm good. -Let's go kick bad guy butt.
translation.zh: -我没事-我们去痛揍他们

translation.en: Oh my god! Here we go.
translation.zh: 天呐！开始了

translation.en: [Allie] Hammer, it is time to go on the offensive.
translation.zh: 大锤 主动出击

translation.en: -I know what I'm gonna do. -[Emily] What're you doing?
translation.zh: -我知道我要做什么-你干什么？

translation.en: -I'm gonna kangaroo his ass. -I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.zh: -我给他来个袋鼠大跳-我觉得不是好主意

translation.en: I know. It's a great idea.
translation.zh: 我知道 这是个绝妙的主意

translation.en: Crab, we got a situation here.
translation.zh: 螃蟹 这边有情况

translation.en: Handle it, Kenny.
translation.zh: 处理一下 肯尼

translation.en: G'day, mate. [grunts]
translation.zh: 你好 伙计

translation.en: Went better than I thought.
translation.zh: 比我预想的要好

translation.en: Little mule likes to kick.
translation.zh: 小骡子喜欢胡乱踢人

translation.en: Hi there, take it easy.
translation.zh: 你好 别紧张

translation.en: What, uh, what are you?
translation.zh: 你是什么？

translation.en: Well, I'm a Gemini.
translation.zh: 我是双子座

translation.en: What the hell are you?
translation.zh: 你又是什么？

translation.en: You'd think Cancer but Capricorn actually, Sag moon.
translation.zh: 你会以为我是巨蟹座 其实我是摩羯洋苏草之月

translation.en: And all kinds of things… rising.
translation.zh: 很多东西都在…雄起

translation.en: -Well, let's hope so. -Lydia!
translation.zh: -我们希望如此-莉迪亚！

translation.en: -Pretty sweet jump. -[Emily] What are you doing?
translation.zh: -跳得挺高啊-你干什么呢？

translation.en: -I have strong thighs. -[Emily] Stop bragging about your thighs!
translation.zh: -我的大腿格外强健有力-别夸耀你的大腿了！

translation.en: Does take a certain woman to look good dropping through acoustic tile.
translation.zh: 砸穿天花板掉下来 还这么美丽动人你不是一般的女子

translation.en: [Emily] Lydia!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！

translation.en: [Emily] Lydia! Hey!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！嘿！

translation.en: [Emily] Hey! Lydia!
translation.zh: 嘿！莉迪亚！

translation.en: [Emily] What are you doing?
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 你干什么呢？

translation.en: -Ow! -I got her, boss.
translation.zh: 我来收拾她 老大

translation.en: [Emily] You're about to be Thunder Forced.
translation.zh: 尝尝雷霆女神的厉害

translation.en: Em, stop!
translation.zh: 艾米莉 住手！

translation.en: It's not me. The taser is locked in a high voltage loop.
translation.zh: 不是我电击枪锁定在高压循环模式了

translation.en: I can't get it off his face!
translation.zh: 我没法从他脸上抽回来！

translation.en: I was trying to tell you, don't use a high setting!
translation.zh: 我一直想告诉你 别设定高档位！

translation.en: -You're cooking him from inside. -Man!
translation.zh: -你要把他从里到外烤熟了-啊！

translation.en: Please don't film this, sir. This is a mistake!
translation.zh: 先生 请不要拍摄 这是个错误！

translation.en: -Why are you still tasing me? -It's a mistake!
translation.zh: -你为什么电起我来没完没了？-这是个错误！

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -太惨了-对不起

translation.en: -"Sorry"? He was trying to kill me. -[The Crab] He's a murderer and felon.
translation.zh: -“对不起”？他要打死我-他是杀人犯 犯有重罪

translation.en: He deserves better.
translation.zh: 但这也太过分了

translation.en: It's been a blast but we're gonna hit it. Get your shit together.
translation.zh: 我们玩得很尽兴 但我们要走了兄弟们 撤

translation.en: -Wait a minute. Nobo-- -Nobody move. Nobody move.
translation.zh: -等等 谁也…-谁也别动

translation.en: [The Crab] What's gonna happen? You guys stopped the heist.
translation.zh: 你们还要怎样？你们阻止了一次抢劫

translation.en: You cooked the dude. You're gonna kill us?
translation.zh: 把那家伙烤熟了 还要打死我们吗？

translation.en: That'd make you as bad as a crab-man. Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 那样的话你们也不比我螃蟹好到哪去 我们走

translation.en: You're an embarrassment, you know that?
translation.zh: 你们真是丢人现眼 知道吗？

translation.en: [clerk] Wait, wait, wait. Are you Miscreants?
translation.zh: 等等 你们是恶徒吗？

translation.en: No, we're Thunder Force.
translation.zh: 不是 我们是雷霆女神

translation.en: Damn right we are.
translation.zh: 千真万确

translation.en: We did it!
translation.zh: 我们成功了！

translation.en: What's Thunder Force?
translation.zh: 雷霆女神是谁？

translation.en: They don't… they don't-- Do the thing.
translation.zh: 他们不…让他瞧瞧

translation.en: [both] We're Thunder Force.
translation.zh: 我们是雷霆女神

translation.en: [Lydia] See? Is it still not…
translation.zh: 怎么样？还是不…

translation.en: It's out of context. It's probably still confu-- We're the good guys.
translation.zh: 缺乏语境 好像还是不…我们是好人

translation.en: We're not doing it for thanks. We protect the city.
translation.zh: 我们不求你们感恩戴德我们只求城市平安

translation.en: If you wanna thank me with a pickle in a bag--
translation.zh: 但如果你想给我一袋酸黄瓜表示感谢…

translation.en: Hey, you saved our lives.
translation.zh: 你们救了我们的命

translation.en: You deserve a pickle bag.
translation.zh: 你有资格要一袋酸黄瓜

translation.en: Okay, so we're out,
translation.zh: 好 我们走了

translation.en: and just know, this is gonna to be in here before we hit the Lambo.
translation.zh: 不等我们回到兰博基尼车上这条黄瓜就会进我嘴里

translation.en: Sorry about that.
translation.zh: 很抱歉

translation.en: -Remember, Thunder Force. -Thunder Force saving the city, y'all.
translation.zh: -记住 雷霆女神-雷霆女神拯救城市

translation.en: For the first time in history,
translation.zh: 有史以来第一次

translation.en: actual superheroes are fighting back against the Miscreant menace.
translation.zh: 真正的超级英雄出现了她们开始反击恶徒

translation.en: They call themselves "Thunder Force" and after a rocky start with a taser,
translation.zh: 她们自称“雷霆女神”第一次动用电击枪时不怎么顺利

translation.en: they've been fighting crime on a regular basis in our city
translation.zh: 但自那以后 她们频频现身 打击犯罪

translation.en: and getting real results.
translation.zh: 战绩卓著

translation.en: "These are the two morons that ripped off the jewelry store on Grant Street.
translation.zh: “就是这两个傻瓜抢了格兰特街的珠宝店”

translation.en: We don't want any reward,
translation.zh: “我们不求回报

translation.en: but would like to throw out the first pitch at a Cubs game.
translation.zh: 但希望能在小熊队比赛时扔出第一记投球”

translation.en: Sincerely, Thunder Force."
translation.zh: “此致 雷霆女神”

translation.en: How could you not love Thunder Force?
translation.zh: 谁能不热爱雷霆女神？

translation.en: And it seems that Chicago's new super-team knows how to have fun.
translation.zh: 而且 貌似芝加哥新登场的超级组合还很会玩

translation.en: The question is, "Is Thunder Force a match for Laser?"
translation.zh: 问题是：“雷霆女神斗得过激光女吗？”

translation.en: In other news, Rachel Gonzales has narrowed the gap
translation.zh: 其他新闻：瑞秋冈萨雷斯在民调中缩小了

translation.en: with The King in the polls.
translation.zh: 和国王之间的差距

translation.en: Her progressive platform and campaign have given Gonzales a bump among voters.
translation.zh: 进步的竞选纲领和草根战略 让冈萨雷斯赢得了更多选民的青睐

translation.en: Who are these two?
translation.zh: 这两个人是谁？

translation.en: Where'd they get their powers?
translation.zh: 她们哪来的超能力？

translation.en: If there are superheroes now, what do people need me for?
translation.zh: 有了超级英雄 人们还要我干什么？

translation.en: Tough to know.
translation.zh: 很难说

translation.en: -The whole point is I'm scaring people. -Sure.
translation.zh: -全部重点就在于 我让人民恐惧-当然

translation.en: Manipulating the media into believing that you're a problem only I can solve.
translation.zh: 让媒体相信 你们是个问题只有我能解决

translation.en: That's how I win this stupid election.
translation.zh: 这样我才能赢这个该死的竞选

translation.en: How can we not stop two chicks in their forties?
translation.zh: 我们为什么连两个40岁出头的女人都打不过？

translation.en: -Mid-forties at least. -At least.
translation.zh: -至少45岁上下-至少的

translation.en: Here you go, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 给您

translation.en: There he is. Looking better.
translation.zh: 他看起来好多了

translation.en: -You look like balls. -Sorry. I'll get some cream or something.
translation.zh: -你的脑袋像驴蛋-对不起 我去拿些奶油

translation.en: A lot of it. Get a lot.
translation.zh: 多拿点

translation.en: Not to sound like a femme fatale, but it feels like I need to kill them.
translation.zh: 我并不想扮演美女蛇的角色但我似乎需要干掉她们

translation.en: Toss her a treat.
translation.zh: 马屁精

translation.en: I like her.
translation.zh: 我喜欢她

translation.en: -What? -I like you, Laser.
translation.zh: -什么？-我喜欢你 激光女

translation.en: But here's what I think.
translation.zh: 但我是这么想的

translation.en: If I let you kill them now, I get heat because it looks like I couldn't stop you.
translation.zh: 如果我现在让你干掉她们 我就会承受压力因为人们会认为我无力阻止你

translation.en: So, I say we have a talk with them.
translation.zh: 所以 我认为我们应该和她们谈判

translation.en: And if the talk goes right, it goes right, but if it goes wrong…
translation.zh: 如果谈判成功 当然很好如果不成功…

translation.en: I kill them.
translation.zh: 我干掉她们

translation.en: Yeah, I was gonna…
translation.zh: 对 我就是…

translation.en: I'm not so sure they're gonna be so easy to kill, boss.
translation.zh: 老板 我担心她们不那么容易被干掉

translation.en: -Come here. -No, thank you. I'm okay.
translation.zh: -过来-不 谢谢 不必了

translation.en: No. Come, come, come.
translation.zh: 不 不 来呀

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come here.
translation.zh: 来呀 过来

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: Clean that up.
translation.zh: 打扫干净

translation.en: [Lydia] Look at this. This is awesome. We have our own logo.
translation.zh: 看呐 太棒了 我们有了自己的标志

translation.en: -[Tracy] I designed it. -Honey, we're legit now.
translation.zh: -我设计的-亲爱的 我们是正规军了

translation.en: You know what? If we've got a logo this cool, we are ready for a theme song.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么？我们有了这么酷的标志还需要一首主题歌

translation.en: Like an anthem. Like David Lee Roth, Jon Bon Jovi.
translation.zh: 一首招牌金曲比如大卫李罗斯、邦乔飞乐队

translation.en: They come down, lay down some lyrics.
translation.zh: 让他们来给我们写歌词

translation.en: I'll play guitar. Right after I learn how to play guitar.
translation.zh: 我弹吉他 当然我要先学会弹吉他

translation.en: Uh, do you remember the high school talent show?
translation.zh: 还记得高中才艺秀吗？

translation.en: Girl, why--
translation.zh: 姐姐 你为什么…

translation.en: Get behind me.
translation.zh: 躲在我身后

translation.en: There's a handle, you know.
translation.zh: 门上有把手的呀

translation.en: Oops, couldn't find it.
translation.zh: 哎哟 没看见

translation.en: Stand down.
translation.zh: 你退后

translation.en: This is a social visit. Otherwise, you'd already be, you know, dead.
translation.zh: 这是一次友好访问不然 你们早已死了

translation.en: You two are working together? Of course.
translation.zh: 你们俩是一伙的？当然了

translation.en: It's all been a setup.
translation.zh: 这完全是个阴谋

translation.en: I bet The Crab works for you too, huh. Are you rounding up all the Miscreants?
translation.zh: 我打赌 螃蟹也是你的手下吧？所有恶徒都成你的走狗了？

translation.en: Look at that. You really are smart.
translation.zh: 看呐 你的确聪明

translation.en: Sweet. Yeah, I'm kind of unionizing them.
translation.zh: 好极了 是的 我把他们组织起来了

translation.en: Someday, all Miscreants will work for me.
translation.zh: 有朝一日 所有恶徒都会为我所用

translation.en: Tracy, will you let Allie know we have guests?
translation.zh: 特蕾西 你去告诉艾丽 来客人了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Was Allie the, uh, the bossy girl with all the rules?
translation.zh: 艾丽是那个爱发号施令的姑娘吗？规矩特别多的那个？

translation.en: Hey, she's unconscious in the hallway.
translation.zh: 嘿 她在走廊里昏过去了

translation.en: Knocked her out when we fried security.
translation.zh: 我们破坏安防系统的时候把她打晕了

translation.en: Anyway, you're changing the narrative of the election, and I can't have that,
translation.zh: 你们改变了竞选的叙事 我不能容忍

translation.en: so I could always use a couple of Miscreants or superheroes
translation.zh: 所以 如果再来两个恶徒或超级英雄为我服务 我总是很欢迎的

translation.en: or whatever it is you two are.
translation.zh: 不管你们到底是什么

translation.en: I could definitely use your muscle as I expand operations here.
translation.zh: 我扩张势力的时候绝对用得上你们的力量

translation.en: And I could probably use whatever it is that you do, too.
translation.zh: 我不知道你会什么也许也能派得上用场

translation.en: -I think. -What if we just say no?
translation.zh: -也许-我们要是不同意呢？

translation.en: What if I pick you two up and smack ya together like castanets, huh?
translation.zh: 如果我把你们俩抓过来像打响板一样对着敲呢？

translation.en: Maybe we start telling people what's going on.
translation.zh: 也许我们会告诉人们事情的真相

translation.en: I'm gonna win this election and become mayor,
translation.zh: 我会赢得竞选 成为市长

translation.en: and then I'm gonna win other elections until I'm president,
translation.zh: 今后我还会赢更多竞选直到我当上总统

translation.en: -and then I'll be pulling all the strings. -Huh.
translation.zh: 那时 我就有了掌控一切的力量

translation.en: You've got family here in town, don't you, Bongo?
translation.zh: 邦果 你在本地还有亲人 是不是？

translation.en: It's Bingo.
translation.zh: 是宾果

translation.en: I don't care.
translation.zh: 我不在乎

translation.en: -I don't know why I'm defending that name. -Not now.
translation.zh: -我为什么要纠正他 我讨厌这个名字-现在不是时候

translation.en: Come on, lady-girls.
translation.zh: 想想吧 姑娘们

translation.en: What side of history you wanna be on?
translation.zh: 你们想站在历史的哪一边？

translation.en: I'm not scared of you.
translation.zh: 我不怕你

translation.en: -Can't wait to kill you both. -Oh--
translation.zh: 我迫不及待想把你们俩都干掉

translation.en: -What? -I wasn't done.
translation.zh: -什么？-我还没说完

translation.en: -I'm right here. -Sure, okay.
translation.zh: -看这里-当然 好吧

translation.en: Can't wait to kill you both.
translation.zh: 我迫不及待想把你们俩都干掉

translation.en: -All that for the same line-- -Can't wait to kill you both.
translation.zh: -一句台词重复两遍…-我迫不及待想把你们俩都干掉

translation.en: Especially you, Bingo.
translation.zh: 尤其是你 宾果

translation.en: You just-- You gotta work on your act a little bit. There we go.
translation.zh: 你们…你们需要好好排演一下哦 她走了

translation.en: She always walk that slow?
translation.zh: 她总是这么慢吞吞吗？

translation.en: That's gotta drive you nuts, right?
translation.zh: 你肯定急死了吧？

translation.en: Bye. Thanks for coming.
translation.zh: 再见 感谢光临

translation.en: -Don't antagonize them. -I get nervous.
translation.zh: -不要刺激他们-对不起 我太紧张了

translation.en: [Laser] Here, to the right.
translation.zh: 这边 右转

translation.en: -We gotta go check on Grandma. -Okay. Let's go.
translation.zh: -我们得去看看外婆-走

translation.en: [Grandma] Lydia, would you say grace, please?
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 你来念祈祷词好吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Dear God, bless this food and the hands that prepared it.
translation.zh: 亲爱的上帝 请你祝福这食物和备办这些食物的双手

translation.en: Uh, you know, thanks for being super cool and stuff.
translation.zh: 你真是超级酷 感谢你

translation.en: So, keep kicking butt and, uh, peace out.
translation.zh: 所以再接再厉 再见

translation.en: Amen.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
translation.zh: -阿门-阿门

translation.en: have you, um, given any more thought
translation.zh: 外婆 我可以帮您搬到一个更安全的街区

translation.en: to letting me get you a place in a safer neighborhood?
translation.zh: 您有没有再考虑一下？

translation.en: Why would I?
translation.zh: 我为什么要搬家？

translation.en: This has been my home for a long time, and it'll do me until the end.
translation.zh: 这里一直是我家我会住在这里直到终老

translation.en: Please don't talk like that.
translation.zh: 外婆 请别这么说

translation.en: I dig it, Grandma. Morality, right?
translation.zh: 我理解 外婆 谁能化羽成仙？

translation.en: It's mortality.
translation.zh: 羽化成仙

translation.en: It's what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Mortality. -That's what I said.
translation.zh: -羽化-我就是这么说的

translation.en: You said morality.
translation.zh: 你说“化羽”

translation.en: -I'm-- What are you saying? -Mortality.
translation.zh: -你说什么？-羽化

translation.en: You're just putting extra Ts in it, Morta-ta-ta-tality.
translation.zh: “羽化” “化羽” 正说反说都一样

translation.en: I am so happy to see you girls getting along again. So nice.
translation.zh: 你们两个又和好如初了 真好我真高兴

translation.en: -And where is my great-granddaughter? -She's at work.
translation.zh: -我的曾外孙女呢？-她在工作

translation.en: She's a hard worker just like her mom.
translation.zh: 她这么勤劳 跟她妈妈一样

translation.en: Can you keep a secret?
translation.zh: 您能保守秘密吗？

translation.en: -You better not keep secrets from me. -We shouldn't tell her.
translation.zh: -有什么秘密可别瞒着我-我们不应该告诉她

translation.en: Why not? We should probably tell somebody. She probably knows.
translation.zh: 为什么？我们也许应该告诉某个人她可能已经知道了呢

translation.en: -Lydia-- -We're--
translation.zh: -莉迪亚…-我们…

translation.en: Oh, this is amazing.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Oh, please let it be true.
translation.zh: 但愿这是真的

translation.en: -I have been praying for this day. -Praying for what?
translation.zh: -我一直盼着这一天呢-盼着什么？

translation.en: -Really? -[Grandma] For this moment.
translation.zh: 真的？ 这一刻

translation.en: For you two to tell me that you're a couple.
translation.zh: 你们告诉我你们是一对

translation.en: I always knew you were right for each other.
translation.zh: 我就知道你们俩在一起最合适了

translation.en: [Lydia] Yeah, um…
translation.zh: 是啊…

translation.en: Wow, that's… I have been saving it for this very moment.
translation.zh: -这真是…-这东西我一直留着 就是为了这一刻

translation.en: -I've got Michelle Obama arms. -You really do. Your arms look amazing.
translation.zh: 我的胳膊像米切尔奥巴马 的确 你的胳膊非常好看 哪个是我？

translation.en: Which one am I?
translation.zh: 的确 你的胳膊非常好看 哪个是我？

translation.en: Okay, you know… Uh, wow, that's a… that's a lot to unpack.
translation.zh: 好吧 你知道…我有点凌乱

translation.en: [Lydia] You know, I think we both prefer…
translation.zh: 我想我们俩都更喜欢…

translation.en: you know, dudes.
translation.zh: 你知道 男人

translation.en: -You don't have to look so disappointed. -I can't help it.
translation.zh: -您也没必要这么失望啊-我情不自禁

translation.en: You could at least try.
translation.zh: 你们至少可以试试嘛

translation.en: What? Now? You gotta woo me.
translation.zh: 什么？现在？你得先追求我

translation.en: I thought that was it.
translation.zh: 我以为是为这事呢

translation.en: But if the secret is you're Thunder Force,
translation.zh: 但如果你说的秘密就是你们是雷霆女神

translation.en: you must think I don't watch the news. You're a meme now.
translation.zh: 那你们一定以为我从不看新闻你们已经成为表情包了

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: uh, Grandma that's kind of why we're here.
translation.zh: 外婆 我们就是为这事来的

translation.en: You could be in danger.
translation.zh: 您可能会有危险

translation.en: At least move into our building.
translation.zh: 至少搬到我们大厦里去吧

translation.en: -Even if it's just temporarily. -I'm not going anywhere.
translation.zh: -哪怕只是暂时的-我哪儿也不去

translation.en: Those people out there killed my daughter,
translation.zh: 那些人杀害了我的女儿

translation.en: took your parents from you, ruined this city.
translation.zh: 让你失去了父母 破坏了这个城市

translation.en: Now I want you two strong women
translation.zh: 我要你们两个女强人

translation.en: to go out there,
translation.zh: 去找他们

translation.en: kick butt like the superheroes you are, and you don't stop until the job is done.
translation.zh: 作为超级英雄 和他们战斗不打败他们绝不罢休

translation.en: -Okay. -And only on that day
translation.zh: -好-只有到了那一天

translation.en: when the city is free from Miscreants,
translation.zh: 当这个城市不再有恶徒

translation.en: can you two have a wedding.
translation.zh: 你们俩才能结婚

translation.en: -Come on, eat. It's getting cold. -[overlapping chatter, laughter]
translation.zh: 快吃吧 菜凉了

translation.en: Hello, Chicago, thank you for being here.
translation.zh: 你好 芝加哥 感谢大家光临

translation.en: I won't take up too much of your time.
translation.zh: 我不会占用大家太多时间

translation.en: I just want you to know…
translation.zh: 我只想告诉大家…

translation.en: -No sign of Laser. -[Tracy] Keep your eyes open.
translation.zh: -没看见激光女-保持警惕

translation.en: This suit is getting ripe. I gotta wash it.
translation.zh: 衣服都有味儿了 我得洗洗

translation.en: -You can't wash it. -Are you kidding?
translation.zh: -不能洗-开玩笑吗？

translation.en: How am I supposed to keep it fresh?
translation.zh: 那我怎么让它保持干净？

translation.en: -I need to work on that. -Yeah, you do.
translation.zh: -这个问题我需要研究-没错

translation.en: Quickly.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: …for the rights and safety of every last one of you.
translation.zh: …为了所有人的权利与安全

translation.en: [all chanting] Rachel!
translation.zh: 瑞秋！

translation.en: Let's give it up for our new super-team who's out protecting our city every night.
translation.zh: 掌声献给每个夜晚守护我们城市的新的超级组合

translation.en: Thunder Force!
translation.zh: 雷霆女神！

translation.en: How's it going, Chicago?
translation.zh: 芝加哥公民们 大家好吗？

translation.en: Exciting news, Thunder Force is available for selfies for the low price of $100.
translation.zh: 好消息 雷霆女神可以和大家合影留念 只需100美元

translation.en: "What? That seems so cheap." "It sure does."
translation.zh: “好便宜啊”“可不是嘛”

translation.en: Um, we do not take selfies, and if we did, they'd be free.
translation.zh: 我们不能合影如果可以的话 也会是免费的

translation.en: And they are free.
translation.zh: 的确是免费的

translation.en: They're free with a $100 donation.
translation.zh: 捐献100美元 即可免费合影

translation.en: -[crowd chanting] Thunder Force! -[Lydia] Stop!
translation.zh: -雷霆女神！-别喊了！

translation.en: Stop, stop, you guys, stop!
translation.zh: 别喊了 安静！

translation.en: We can't take it. Now how do we roll, Chicago?
translation.zh: 我们受不了 芝加哥 我们怎么样？

translation.en: -[crowd] Like thunder! -How do we roll?
translation.zh: -像雷霆一样！-我们怎么样？

translation.en: Like thunder!
translation.zh: 像雷霆一样！

translation.en: -[Lydia] How do we roll? How do we roll? -[crowd chanting] Like thunder!
translation.zh: -我们怎么样？-像雷霆一样！ -我们怎么样？-像雷霆一样！

translation.en: [reporter] One thing we've been covering, early exit polling.
translation.zh: 今天下午 我们一直在关注初步的出口民调

translation.en: We are watching the minute-by-minute examples
translation.zh: 我们看到每一分钟的更新

translation.en: that are coming into us here at the station.
translation.zh: 陆续送达我们的电视台

translation.en: Leading up to the breaking news, we will have…
translation.zh: 直到实时结果出炉 我们会…

translation.en: Maybe we should just turn that off.
translation.zh: 也许我们还是关掉比较好

translation.en: [Kenny] I think so.
translation.zh: 我想也是

translation.en: Hey, chief, you got concealer on? Is that what that is?
translation.zh: 你涂遮瑕霜了吗？那是遮瑕霜吗？

translation.en: Well, yeah. I moisturized it and tried to touch it up a bit.
translation.zh: 对 我用了点保湿水 也稍微遮盖一下

translation.en: -Is it helping? -Not really.
translation.zh: -有效吗？-其实没有

translation.en: Go make a snack. He doesn't need to look at this.
translation.zh: 去给自己找点零食吃吧别让他看见你这样

translation.en: -I'm not hungry. -Preferably something with aloe.
translation.zh: -我不饿-最好是含芦荟的

translation.en: -Okay. -Find an aloe plant and chew on that.
translation.zh: -好吧-找一株芦荟嚼一嚼

translation.en: -[clears throat] -Hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: Never not funny.
translation.zh: 总是这么幽默

translation.en: So, how am I doing?
translation.zh: 我的成绩怎么样？

translation.en: With the, uh…
translation.zh: 你是说…

translation.en: I don't know. I'm not watching. You shouldn't watch either.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我没看 你也不应该看

translation.en: Maybe just go make a pot of that and enjoy.
translation.zh: 也许你应该煮一壶咖啡 享受一下

translation.en: [reporter 2] …protecting our city, Thunder Force!
translation.zh: …每晚保卫着我们的城市 雷霆女神！

translation.en: Thunder Force's recent endorsement of Rachel Gonzales
translation.zh: 最近 雷霆女神公开支持瑞秋冈萨雷斯

translation.en: gave her a bump at the polls.
translation.zh: 令她人气大涨

translation.en: -Andrew. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -安德鲁-嗯

translation.en: -Does this side look the same as this? -No.
translation.zh: -我这边和这边看着一样吗？-不一样

translation.en: Can you tell which? One side has a small scab.
translation.zh: 能看出来哪边不一样吗？一边有一小块结痂

translation.en: -No, a large scab. -Shit.
translation.zh: -是一大块-该死

translation.en: [reporter 2] We have breaking news. We are ready to call the election.
translation.zh: 最新结果出来了我们要宣布选举结果了

translation.en: Rachel Gonzales will be the next mayor of Chicago.
translation.zh: 瑞秋冈萨雷斯将成为下一任芝加哥市长

translation.en: -And this is a major-- -The King doesn't lose!
translation.zh: -这是一次重大…-国王不会输！

translation.en: -[reporter 1] …The King's full reaction. -God damn it, sir.
translation.zh: -国王的反应-见鬼 老板

translation.en: That was Kenny. Good member of the team.
translation.zh: 是肯尼 他是个很好的团队成员

translation.en: He shouldn't have been there.
translation.zh: 他不应该站在那儿

translation.en: Your eyes are doing the weird thing. Can we get you drops?
translation.zh: 你的眼睛又有点奇怪了要不要我们给你找些眼药水？

translation.en: I'm fine. Don't worry about me.
translation.zh: 我没事 别管我

translation.en: That Thunder Force, they're everywhere.
translation.zh: 雷霆女神…到处都有她们

translation.en: Someone needs to kill 'em. They have to be dead.
translation.zh: 需要有人干掉她们 她们必须死

translation.en: Will you stop doing that, please?
translation.zh: 你们别一个劲儿地后退好吗？

translation.en: I'm not some little kid throwing a tantrum!
translation.zh: 我不是一个发脾气的小屁孩

translation.en: I'm very frustrated.
translation.zh: 我感觉非常挫败

translation.en: And even though I killed that guy before,
translation.zh: 而且 尽管我刚才杀死了那个家伙

translation.en: it was kind of an accident, so…
translation.zh: 但那算是个意外 所以…

translation.en: kill that guy.
translation.zh: 杀死他

translation.en: How do you feel now?
translation.zh: 现在感觉怎么样？

translation.en: Yeah, better. But not great. But better.
translation.zh: 好多了 不是很好 但好多了

translation.en: You know, boss, I, uh… I validate your feelings.
translation.zh: 老板 你的感受是合理的

translation.en: Your feelings are your feelings, but tactically speaking
translation.zh: 那就是你的真实感受但是从战术的角度来说

translation.en: I don't think it's smart to be killing off our best crew members.
translation.zh: 我认为 干掉我们最好的团队成员是不明智的

translation.en: -Was that Walter she just zapped? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 那是沃特吗？她刚射死的是沃特吗？

translation.en: -Walter was even better than Kenny. -Crap, I didn't know--
translation.zh: -沃特比肯尼更优秀-该死 我不知道…

translation.en: -I liked Walter. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我喜欢沃特-是啊

translation.en: What's his name?
translation.zh: 他叫什么？

translation.en: The one left standing? That's Andy. Andy, can you say hi?
translation.zh: 站在旁边的那个？他是安迪 安迪 打个招呼

translation.en: -It's actually Andrew, but Andy's fine. -Just the hi.
translation.zh: -其实是安德鲁 但安迪也行-打个招呼

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I don't like that guy.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢这个人

translation.en: Next time, kill And-- What do you prefer? Andrew? Andy?
translation.zh: 下次杀死安…你喜欢人们叫你什么？安德鲁？安迪？

translation.en: Either one. At work it's more professional to go by Andrew.
translation.zh: 都行 在工作场合 叫安德鲁更正式些

translation.en: My mom calls me Andy.
translation.zh: 我妈妈叫我安迪

translation.en: Andy-Pandy, but seems too familiar as I say it out loud.
translation.zh: 安迪-潘迪 但这么叫听起来太亲近了

translation.en: Lacrosse had three Andrews. They called me Drew.
translation.zh: 我的棍网球队里有三个安德鲁他们叫我德鲁

translation.en: My coach called me by my middle name, Andy. Alright.
translation.zh: -我的教练叫我的中间名 安迪-好了

translation.en: My mom's new boyfriend loves Andrew Lloyd Webber.
translation.zh: 我妈妈的新男友喜欢安德鲁洛伊德韦伯

translation.en: -So, he just calls me Paul. -Enough.
translation.zh: -所以 他就叫我保罗-够了

translation.en: Next time kill Andrew.
translation.zh: 下次 杀死安德鲁

translation.en: Got it. What's our next move?
translation.zh: 明白 我们下一步怎么办？

translation.en: Well, as I like to say,
translation.zh: 我总是说

translation.en: when life gives you lemons, make… [both] …lemon-flavored napalm.
translation.zh: 当生活给你柠檬你就做柠檬味的凝固汽油弹

translation.en: It's the greatest saying.
translation.zh: 太精辟了

translation.en: -Call a news conference. -Will do.
translation.zh: -召开记者会-遵命

translation.en: -Clean that up, Andy-rew. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -收拾干净 安迪鲁-遵命

translation.en: -Yeah. -Whatever.
translation.zh: -好-随便

translation.en: [The King] I believe in democracy.
translation.zh: 我相信民主

translation.en: I lost to the better candidate tonight and as a gesture of goodwill,
translation.zh: 今晚我输给了一个更好的候选人为了表达我的善意

translation.en: I'm gonna host a celebration for mayor-elect Gonzales
translation.zh: 我要为候任市长冈萨雷斯和伟大的芝加哥市

translation.en: and the great city of Chicago.
translation.zh: 举办一场庆祝活动

translation.en: Because this city deserves what's coming to it.
translation.zh: 因为这是这座城市应得的

translation.en: A party!
translation.zh: 一场派对

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Frank] Pancakes on the house.
translation.zh: 薄饼免费

translation.en: Look. Business has picked up thanks to you two.
translation.zh: 看呐 多亏你们俩 生意好多了

translation.en: So, thank you, Lydia, Emily.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 莉迪亚 谢谢你 艾米莉

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎

translation.en: -Those suits are great. -Right?
translation.zh: -你们的战衣真棒-对吧？

translation.en: Wish I had one.
translation.zh: 真希望我也有

translation.en: -Alright. Enjoy. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -好吧 慢用-谢谢

translation.en: Yeah. How about a toast to the good guys winning the election?
translation.zh: 好人赢得了选举 干一杯吧

translation.en: Let's not celebrate too fast.
translation.zh: 先别急着庆祝

translation.en: The King's not throwing a party out of the goodness of his heart.
translation.zh: 国王为这个城市举办派对可不是出于好意

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Excuse me. I'm gonna wash my hands up.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我去洗洗手

translation.en: Not washing her hands. She's going to the can.
translation.zh: 她不是洗手去了 她是去上厕所

translation.en: God knows what she's doing. I don't wanna know.
translation.zh: 天知道她在厕所干什么 我不想知道

translation.en: Sometimes I can't picture certain people doing certain things.
translation.zh: 有时我不能设想某些人做某些事

translation.en: Know what I mean? Like Obama vacuuming
translation.zh: 你明白我意思吗？比如奥巴马吸地

translation.en: or Eleanor Roosevelt flossing--
translation.zh: 或者埃琳娜罗斯福用牙线洁牙…
