translation.en: -Em, are you okay? -What happened?
translation.zh: -艾米莉…你没事吧？-出什么事了？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Frank, stay down.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 别起来

translation.en: Stay down.
translation.zh: 别起来

translation.en: I thought The King wanted to talk things through.
translation.zh: 我以为国王想要谈判

translation.en: I've been let off the leash.
translation.zh: 我的链子被解开了

translation.en: You need to work on your phrasing,
translation.zh: 你应该好好想想怎么说话照你这么说

translation.en: because in that scenario, you just made yourself the dog.
translation.zh: 你应该好好想想怎么说话照你这么说 你成狗了

translation.en: I'm surprised you ding-dongs lived through the first blast.
translation.zh: 你们这几个白痴居然逃过了第一次轰炸

translation.en: -You're stronger than I thought. -Maybe you're weaker than you thought.
translation.zh: -你们比我想的更扛打-也许你没有你自己想的那么强

translation.en: I'm…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: not…
translation.zh: 很…

translation.en: weak!
translation.zh: 强！

translation.en: Did she call us ding-dongs?
translation.zh: 她说我们是白痴？

translation.en: Get a shovel. I'm gonna bury that bitch.
translation.zh: 找把铁锹 我要埋了那个贱人

translation.en: -No! We just fixed that door! -Frank, be qui--
translation.zh: -不！我们刚把那门修好！-弗兰克 别说…

translation.en: [Frank] Please, no…
translation.zh: 求你 不要…

translation.en: I could hit harder, but I don't wanna kill you,
translation.zh: 我可以打得再狠些 但我不想打死你

translation.en: but you will stop hurting my friends!
translation.zh: 但你不能再伤害我的朋友！

translation.en: Bye-bye, nerds.
translation.zh: 再见 书呆子们

translation.en: Wack job.
translation.zh: 疯婆娘

translation.en: Stop! Everyone off the bus now!
translation.zh: 停车！全体下车！

translation.en: Stay here, Frank. Lydi!
translation.zh: 弗兰克 你别动 莉迪亚！

translation.en: What the hell happened?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: Thunder Force needs this.
translation.zh: 雷霆女神要用这辆车

translation.en: Lydia, no. Do not throw that bus.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 别 不要扔那辆公交车

translation.en: -Lydia! -I got it!
translation.zh: -莉迪亚！-我能行！

translation.en: No, they're too far away! Do not!
translation.zh: 不行 他们跑远了！别扔这辆公交车！

translation.en: I can't hear you because I'm literally throwing a bus!
translation.zh: 我听不见你说什么因为我要扔一辆公交车！

translation.en: Dads, that lady just threw a bus.
translation.zh: 爸爸 那位女士把一辆公交车扔出去了

translation.en: My god, I just threw a bus.
translation.zh: 天呐 我扔了一辆公交车

translation.en: Of course, you did. You don't think before you act.
translation.zh: 可不是么 你做事之前也不想想

translation.en: You always do the stupid thing.
translation.zh: 你总是做蠢事

translation.en: You could've hurt someone.
translation.zh: 你可能会伤及无辜

translation.en: You know how dangerous that was?
translation.zh: 你知道这有多危险吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. I messed up. I was trying to stop her.
translation.zh: 对不起 我搞砸了 我是想阻止她

translation.en: Dang it. You always get carried away.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 你总是忘乎所以

translation.en: Ever since we were kids.
translation.zh: 我们小时候你就是这样

translation.en: You understand this isn't a game? We have a job to do.
translation.zh: 这不是做游戏 你不明白吗？我们肩负着使命

translation.en: I have dedicated my life to stopping Miscreants
translation.zh: 我一辈子致力于阻止恶徒

translation.en: and here you are acting like one.
translation.zh: 现在你的行为就像个恶徒

translation.en: I didn't see you trying anything to stop her except disappearing,
translation.zh: 我没看见你做任何事去阻止她你只会玩消失

translation.en: which, by the way, you've been doing since before you got your power.
translation.zh: 而且我要说 你获得超能力之前 就很会玩消失

translation.en: You know what? I should have both powers because I'd know how to use them.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我应该拥有两种超能力因为我知道如何运用

translation.en: Whatever you say. You're always right.
translation.zh: 随你怎么说 你总是对的

translation.en: You're the special one, not me. Right, Em?
translation.zh: 你出类拔萃 我是俗人 对吧？

translation.en: Crap doodles!
translation.zh: 该死的！

translation.en: [reporter] In their attempt to stop Laser,
translation.zh: 雷霆女神不但没能阻止激光女

translation.en: Thunder Force destroyed a bus and Buckingham Fountain,
translation.zh: 还损毁了一辆公交车和白金汉喷泉

translation.en: raising the question, are we better off with Thunder Force?
translation.zh: 人们不禁要问 雷霆女神会让我们的城市更好吗？

translation.en: -[Emily] Trace? -We'll have more as the story--
translation.zh: -特蕾西？-我们会有更多后续报道…

translation.en: [Emily] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -What are you reading? -Oh.
translation.zh: 看什么呢？

translation.en: Molecular Thermodynamics of Complex Systems.
translation.zh: 《复杂系统的分子热力学》

translation.en: Oh, I love that one.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这本书

translation.en: -Can I read it after you finish? -Sure.
translation.zh: -你看完以后我能再看看吗？-当然

translation.en: Are you okay, Mom?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: I'm, uh…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I'm okay, honey.
translation.zh: 我没事 亲爱的

translation.en: Just… working through some stuff with Lydia.
translation.zh: 只是…和莉迪亚遇到了点问题

translation.en: I know. She called me.
translation.zh: 我知道 她给我打电话了

translation.en: Of course, she did.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: -You guys get along okay, huh? -I like her.
translation.zh: -你们俩相处得还不错？-我喜欢她

translation.en: She's weird and she's funny and we talk about a lot of stuff.
translation.zh: 她怪怪的 又风趣 我们聊很多话题

translation.en: You think I don't talk to you enough?
translation.zh: 你觉得我和你聊得太少？

translation.en: Am I too tough on you?
translation.zh: 我对你太严厉了？

translation.en: I've just… I've always wanted to make it so other people, so you…
translation.zh: 我只是…我一直希望能成功这样其他人 包括你…

translation.en: -didn't have to grow up the way I did. -Afraid?
translation.zh: -就不会再有我那样的童年-担惊受怕？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I'm so sorry, honey.
translation.zh: 真对不起 亲爱的

translation.en: [Emily] I miss my mom and dad every day,
translation.zh: 我每天都想妈妈和爸爸

translation.en: but I've been so consumed with righting a wrong that I've…
translation.zh: 但我一门心思想要伸张正义 以至于…

translation.en: oh, I've missed out on so much of our time together.
translation.zh: 我忽略了对你的陪伴

translation.en: I'm gonna change that.
translation.zh: 我会改正的

translation.en: You do great.
translation.zh: 你做得很好

translation.en: You're too hard on yourself, and Lydia too.
translation.zh: 你对自己和莉迪亚都太苛刻了

translation.en: She's been your friend for a long time. Even when you didn't want her to be.
translation.zh: 她是你多年的朋友哪怕有时候你不想要这个朋友

translation.en: She's always been a bit of a hurricane.
translation.zh: 她总是像一股飓风

translation.en: -She's a good person. -I know she is.
translation.zh: -她是个好人-我知道

translation.en: But she threw a bus.
translation.zh: 但她扔了一辆公交车

translation.en: Yeah, but in her defense, she was trying to stop the bad guys, right?
translation.zh: 是啊 但她也是为了阻止坏人对不对？

translation.en: -She was. -Also, she really wanted to throw a bus.
translation.zh: -是的-另外 她也是真想扔公交车

translation.en: You're too much.
translation.zh: 你太逗了

translation.en: Oh, I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: 我真为你骄傲

translation.en: -Did she say where she was going? -On a date.
translation.zh: -她说要去哪儿了吗？-去约会

translation.en: That's Lydia for you.
translation.zh: 那就是莉迪亚

translation.en: Always finding time to have fun.
translation.zh: 总是找时间玩

translation.en: [The Crab] Swimming is what I try to focus on.
translation.zh: 我想集中精力游泳

translation.en: -[Lydia] Is it? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？-对

translation.en: [Lydia] You got the shoulders for it.
translation.zh: 你肩膀强壮 适合游泳

translation.en: I am very surprised that you reached out to me.
translation.zh: 你主动找我 真没想到

translation.en: Especially since I thought that you might be dead.
translation.zh: 特别是我以为你可能已经死了

translation.en: It wasn't for lack of trying, right?
translation.zh: 有人是想让我死

translation.en: That psycho Laser really put her back into trying to kill us.
translation.zh: 那个神经病激光女竭尽全力想弄死我们

translation.en: It was a surprise you made it out alive.
translation.zh: 你们居然没死 令人意外

translation.en: Lot of people don't live to tell the tale.
translation.zh: 很多时候都不会留下活口

translation.en: She just-- She loves killing people.
translation.zh: 她这人就是喜欢杀人

translation.en: Just loves it. So boring.
translation.zh: 就是喜欢 乏味得很

translation.en: I guess I got lucky. I'm built like a Sherman tank.
translation.zh: 也许算我走运我壮实得像一台谢尔曼坦克

translation.en: -Mmm. -The suits are very resilient. I mean, they do not smell good.
translation.zh: 战衣很抗击打 就是有味儿

translation.en: Wow, they don't smell good. But very resilient.
translation.zh: 哎呀 真是有味儿 但很抗击打

translation.en: You smell good to me.
translation.zh: 我觉得你气息如兰

translation.en: Yeah. Which, you know, is surprising, 'cause I don't have a sense of smell that good,
translation.zh: 这很令人吃惊因为自从那次意外之后

translation.en: ever since the, you know-- Since the accident.
translation.zh: 我的嗅觉就不那么灵敏

translation.en: If it's not too… too much, too soon, what happened?
translation.zh: 如果你不介意我冒昧的话当时是什么情况？

translation.en: Oh, well, I was on my honeymoon in Bermuda,
translation.zh: 我当时在百慕大度蜜月

translation.en: and my then-wife, she says, "Jer, how about we go skinny-dip snorkeling?"
translation.zh: 我当时的妻子说：“杰瑞 我们去裸泳吧？”

translation.en: And, uh, I say, "That sounds fun. Let's go buns up."
translation.zh: 我说：“好啊 我们光屁股下水吧”

translation.en: We took off our clothes, jumped in the water,
translation.zh: 我们就脱掉衣服跳下水

translation.en: and what we didn't know is we were over a radioactive coral reef.
translation.zh: 我们不知道水下有一片有辐射的珊瑚礁

translation.en: Is that right?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: And up jumps a radioactive crab, bites me in the genitals.
translation.zh: 一只带辐射的螃蟹跳上来咬了我的要害

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 哎哟

translation.en: Rest is history.
translation.zh: 然后就这样了

translation.en: -She immediately left me. -Her loss.
translation.zh: -她立刻离开我了-这是她的损失

translation.en: Anyway, I went into a life of crime.
translation.zh: 总之 我开始走上犯罪道路

translation.en: I don't know, it brings up some kinda questions.
translation.zh: 我也不知道啦 这引出一些问题

translation.en: You tell me that story. Are you-- I mean, are you fully a Miscreant or…
translation.zh: 你对我讲了你的遭遇 那么你是彻头彻尾的恶徒吗？还是…

translation.en: Not crazy about labels.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢标签

translation.en: -But I do get that a lot. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -但经常有人这么问我-是啊

translation.en: What I usually-- I say I'm a Half-creant.
translation.zh: 通常…我会说 我是个半徒

translation.en: -Half-Korean. -Half-creant.
translation.zh: -斑秃-半徒

translation.en: I thought you said half-Korean.
translation.zh: 我以为你说斑秃

translation.en: You're not the first one to-- Yeah, but no.
translation.zh: 你不是第一个…是啊 但不是

translation.en: Either one would be wildly interesting, but Half-creant… I like that.
translation.zh: 斑秃 半徒 都没关系但是“半徒”…我喜欢

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I thought we had a real nice connection there at the liquor store.
translation.zh: 嘿 我觉得 在那个卖酒商店我们好像擦出了些火花呢

translation.en: You know, I don't know if it's…
translation.zh: 我不知道是不是

translation.en: because I got a lot of family up and down the East Coast or…
translation.zh: 因为我的很多亲戚散居在东海岸各地还是…

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Maybe it's the smell of Old Bay has always kind of…
translation.zh: 也许老湾调味料的气息总是那么…

translation.en: just done something to me.
translation.zh: 总是让我迷恋

translation.en: Kind of made me warm and fuzzy.
translation.zh: 让我感到温暖、柔软

translation.en: It's a great smell.
translation.zh: 很好闻

translation.en: I look at you and I just think somewhere inside those kind of yoked, strong…
translation.zh: 我看着你 我想 在那坚硬强壮的…

translation.en: glistening shells,
translation.zh: 闪光的甲壳下面

translation.en: is the heart of a really good man-crab.
translation.zh: 有一颗善良的螃蟹男人的心

translation.en: How about a toast, huh? To me, right?
translation.zh: 干一杯吧？敬我？

translation.en: -To you. -Come here.
translation.zh: -敬你-来

translation.en: -It's-- -Hang on one sec.
translation.zh: -你…-稍等

translation.en: -Can I get you a little-- -No, I'm not a child.
translation.zh: -要不要我…-不用 我不是小孩

translation.en: Sometimes I do need to drink it like it's cocoa.
translation.zh: 有时候 我得像喝一杯可可那样

translation.en: -Yep. Me too. -They're super powerful. But let's try it.
translation.zh: -对 我也是-它们力气超大 但我们试试

translation.en: Cheers to me, huh?
translation.zh: 为我干杯

translation.en: Son of a bitch! [loudly] God damn it!
translation.zh: 混蛋！该死的东西！

translation.en: Oh, don't be rude. Eat your dinner. Thank you.
translation.zh: 不要失态 吃你的晚饭吧 谢谢

translation.en: [Lydia] Show's over.
translation.zh: 没戏看了

translation.en: I keep thinking I've got a handle on it.
translation.zh: 我总觉得我掌握了窍门我就应该用小酒盅

translation.en: I should stick with shot glasses and things get easier for me.
translation.zh: 我总觉得我掌握了窍门我就应该用小酒盅 那样会容易一些 谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thanks for that.
translation.zh: 那样会容易一些 谢谢 谢谢

translation.en: You got a… a weak glass there.
translation.zh: 你们的酒杯太不结实

translation.en: Hey, there. Thank you, Carl. We'll clean that right up.
translation.zh: 谢谢 卡尔 我们来收拾

translation.en: Happens all the time. Any decisions on food?
translation.zh: 经常发生 想好点什么了吗？

translation.en: -Well-- -If you're looking for suggestions,
translation.zh: 嗯… 如果你们需要一点建议的话

translation.en: my favorite appetizer to share, personally, is the petite seafood tower.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的开胃菜是小海鲜塔

translation.en: It has everything.
translation.zh: 什么都有

translation.en: Has crab claws, Dungeness crab, snow crab, tiger prawns--
translation.zh: 蟹钳 珍宝蟹、雪蟹、虎虾…

translation.en: I didn't know we were getting food and entertainment.
translation.zh: 没想到我们来吃饭还有娱乐项目

translation.en: -It is fun! -Jimmy Jokes.
translation.zh: -的确很有趣-谐星

translation.en: Hey, are you pitching the tower, the seafood tower to a half-crab?
translation.zh: 你是在向一个半人半蟹的生物推荐海鲜塔吗？

translation.en: -Jesus. -Recommending that to me, huh? [laughs]
translation.zh: -老天-向我推荐螃蟹

translation.en: -That takes a lot of stones. -What is this, the cannibal table?
translation.zh: -需要很大勇气啊-你们这里都吃同类吗？

translation.en: You gonna offer me a 32-year-old woman named Lydia?
translation.zh: 你要给我上一个32岁名叫莉迪亚的女人吗？

translation.en: Because I'm 32.
translation.zh: 因为我就是32岁

translation.en: I believe it and I won't offer you that. I'll be sensible next time.
translation.zh: 我相信 我不会给你上那个下次我会更小心

translation.en: Connect with your guests better.
translation.zh: 多理解顾客一点

translation.en: I am so sorry, sir. I didn't see your pincers.
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 我没看见你的钳子

translation.en: [The Crab] I apologize for raising my voice,
translation.zh: 我为我提高音量道歉

translation.en: but I got bit on the ball bag by a radioactive crab,
translation.zh: 但是我被带辐射的螃蟹咬了下体

translation.en: and I used to love shellfish.
translation.zh: 而我曾经喜欢海鲜

translation.en: So, my fuse is a little short. This is a trigger environment for me.
translation.zh: 所以 我容易发怒餐厅是个容易让我失控的场所

translation.en: -I understand. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我理解-好

translation.en: I'm gonna need a minute. Why don't you take off?
translation.zh: 我需要一分钟时间 你先走开吧

translation.en: No problem.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: -They're just jealous. -'Cause of who I'm sitting with maybe.
translation.zh: -他们只是嫉妒-可能是因为我和你相对而坐

translation.en: Anything on that menu look good?
translation.zh: 菜单上有你喜欢的吗？

translation.en: I was thinking about chicken, but I was afraid you might be half-chicken.
translation.zh: 我在考虑这个鸡肉但我担心你可能有一半是鸡

translation.en: Ha. No, no. Just crab and man.
translation.zh: 不 只是半螃蟹半人

translation.en: A lot of man. I was gonna order the chicken too,
translation.zh: 一大半是人 我也想点鸡肉呢

translation.en: but unfortunately, I like my chicken the way you get it in the crab traps,
translation.zh: 但很不幸 我喜欢的鸡肉是放在捕蟹笼里的那种

translation.en: -and that's raw. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 生鸡肉

translation.en: -What happened? -I just got…
translation.zh: -怎么了？-我只是…

translation.en: Do you like raw chicken, too?
translation.zh: 你也喜欢生鸡肉？

translation.en: Ever since…
translation.zh: 自从

translation.en: kind of what I've gone through,
translation.zh: 我经历了改造之后

translation.en: physically, I've had a kind of insatiable…
translation.zh: 从生理上来说 我就极度

translation.en: craving for raw chicken myself.
translation.zh: 爱吃生鸡肉

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 把手给我

translation.en: So, you tracked me down, you know?
translation.zh: 你找到我

translation.en: What do you wanna know?
translation.zh: 是想知道什么？

translation.en: I just need to know whose side you're on.
translation.zh: 我只需要知道 你站在谁一边

translation.en: What are you doin'?
translation.zh: 你干什么？

translation.en: I'm just butterin' your knuckle.
translation.zh: 只是往你手上涂些黄油

translation.en: I know things are weird between us because we had harsh words.
translation.zh: 我知道我们相互说了些狠话现在我们之间有点怪怪的

translation.en: Yes, because I threw the city bus even though you said, "Do not."
translation.zh: 也是因为我扔了一辆城市公交尽管你不让我扔

translation.en: And it didn't make it any better than whatever the city bus thing did.
translation.zh: 而且我扔城市公交还不是最糟糕的

translation.en: It's gonna cost a million dollars and I wish I'd stop talking.
translation.zh: 可能造成了一百万美元的损失我真应该闭嘴

translation.en: I'm like, worse than Tom in accounting who's like, "My ledger."
translation.zh: 我比财会部的汤姆还差劲他总是说：“我的账簿”

translation.en: He always smells like old lady liniment or like an old lady chafing
translation.zh: 他总有一股老太太身上的药膏的味儿就像老太太的擦伤膏

translation.en: and now I'm almost worse than Tom, if that's possible.
translation.zh: 现在我几乎连汤姆也不如了如果有人可能比他还差劲的话

translation.en: -Tom, I'm gonna have to call you back. -[Tom] No problem.
translation.zh: -汤姆 我回头打给你-没问题

translation.en: Tom, just ki-- Gotcha! April Fools.
translation.zh: 汤姆 我只是…哈哈！愚人节快乐

translation.en: -Just not in April. [laughs] Is he gone? -He's gone.
translation.zh: -不过现在不是四月 他挂了？-他挂了

translation.en: It's, uh, so much more money than a million bucks.
translation.zh: 比一百万多得多呢

translation.en: -More? -It's okay. I'm gonna cover it.
translation.zh: -多得多？-没关系 我会赔付的

translation.en: And no one was hurt. Somehow.
translation.zh: 而且 没人受伤 万幸

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I heard you were on a date.
translation.zh: 听说你约会去了

translation.en: It was really more of a fact-finding mission.
translation.zh: 应该说是寻找真相

translation.en: I… I found out what The King is up to.
translation.zh: 我知道国王要干什么了

translation.en: And that little party he's throwing, it's just like a group funeral.
translation.zh: 他举办的派对会是一场集体葬礼

translation.en: He's gonna take those people that didn't vote for him,
translation.zh: 他要把所有没投票给他的人抓起来

translation.en: put 'em in a building, blow it to smithereens.
translation.zh: 关进一座大楼里 然后把楼炸掉

translation.en: -How did you get this information? -Hmm?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Who told you?
translation.zh: 谁告诉你的？

translation.en: The King's lost it since the election. I'm gonna get out of the game.
translation.zh: 自从竞选失败 国王真的疯了我得退出

translation.en: [spluttering] Who-- Who told you? What?
translation.zh: 谁告诉你的？什么？

translation.en: What happened to your buttons?
translation.zh: 你的衣扣怎么了？

translation.en: Ooh, that's a great start. Yep. Ooh.
translation.zh: 良好的开端

translation.en: The Crab? You're saying it negatively.
translation.zh: -螃蟹？-你的口气很负面

translation.en: The Crab? Oh my-- The Crab?
translation.zh: 螃蟹？天呐 螃蟹？

translation.en: -Now, I-- -I knew you were lookin' at him weird.
translation.zh: -我…-我就知道你看他的眼神不对

translation.en: Don't point at me! Don't point at me! Don't judge-y point at me.
translation.zh: 别指着我！别说我

translation.en: Did you get surf and turfed?
translation.zh: 你是不是吃海陆大餐了？

translation.en: Surf and turf is not a thing. But I did.
translation.zh: 没有什么海陆大餐 但是的 我吃了

translation.en: What did I find?
translation.zh: 看我找到了什么？

translation.en: What is that? Did you take that from the restaurant, you little outlaw?
translation.zh: 这是什么？你从餐馆偷出来的？你这小贼

translation.en: Of course not. I always keep an Old Bay in my bra.
translation.zh: 当然不是 我总是在胸罩里放一瓶老湾调味料

translation.en: You never know when you have to season something tasty.
translation.zh: 你永远不知道什么时候需要加点料

translation.en: That's tender. Don't forget Mr. Right.
translation.zh: 太温柔了 别忘了右手先生

translation.en: -I couldn't forget about him. Believe it. -Powder, Mommy.
translation.zh: -我怎么会忘了他-撒些粉 亲爱的

translation.en: I'm gonna throw you in that hot tub and have myself a low-country boil!
translation.zh: 我要把你扔进浴缸享用一顿海鲜汤锅！

translation.en: He was-- Don't.
translation.zh: 他很…别

translation.en: He was, you know, very charming.
translation.zh: 他很迷人

translation.en: And he's very good with his…
translation.zh: 他这个很在行

translation.en: Honey! He's a crab!
translation.zh: 亲爱的！他是只螃蟹！

translation.en: I know, but I love crab.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我爱螃蟹

translation.en: I know this is gonna sound crazy, but I really think we can trust him.
translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很疯狂但我真的认为我们能相信他

translation.en: I don't know we should be getting info from a Miscreant.
translation.zh: 我们不能听信恶徒提供的情报

translation.en: Well, he's Half-creant.
translation.zh: 他是个半徒

translation.en: Half-Korean?
translation.zh: 他还是斑秃？

translation.en: No. That's what I said. Not "half-Korean," he's a "Half-creant."
translation.zh: 不 我也听错了 他不是斑秃 是半徒

translation.en: There's something about him.
translation.zh: 他身上有股气质

translation.en: Somewhere in there, he's a good guy.
translation.zh: 我想在内心深处 他是个好人

translation.en: Coming from me, that might not mean much, because of the bus,
translation.zh: 这话从我嘴里说出来 可能没啥意义因为那公交车事件

translation.en: and, you know, I barged in here and took your power,
translation.zh: 我还闯进你的实验室抢走了你的超能力

translation.en: which is probably the cooler power,
translation.zh: 而且可能是更酷的那一个超能力

translation.en: even before I said it wasn't, but it kind of is.
translation.zh: 尽管我曾说不是 但其实是的

translation.en: Oh, Lydi…
translation.zh: 莉迪亚

translation.en: Sometimes I don't know if I'm mad at you because you always go crazy
translation.zh: 有时候 我不知道我是生你的气因为你总是疯疯癫癫的

translation.en: or if I'm really just mad at myself because…
translation.zh: 还是说我其实是生自己的气 因为…

translation.en: I never do.
translation.zh: 我从没疯癫过

translation.en: Well, we can't both be nuts.
translation.zh: 我们俩不能都是疯子

translation.en: Let's just figure out how we can stop The King.
translation.zh: 我们还是想想怎么阻止国王吧

translation.en: I know you can do anything you put that big brain to.
translation.zh: 凭你的智慧 你想做什么都能做到

translation.en: I mean, look at me.
translation.zh: 看看我

translation.en: You made a loser into something special.
translation.zh: 你把一个没出息的货变成了一个出类拔萃的人

translation.en: Lydi…
translation.zh: 莉迪亚

translation.en: Even though I was dumb enough to let us drift apart,
translation.zh: 我太傻 当年和你渐行渐远

translation.en: you've always been special.
translation.zh: 但你一直是个出类拔萃的人

translation.en: Thanks, Em.
translation.zh: 谢谢 艾米莉

translation.en: Not to kill the mood, but Allie's been listening to your entire conversation.
translation.zh: 我不想破坏气氛但是你们的对话艾丽都听见了

translation.en: She says you need to wrap up this "after-school special," suit up,
translation.zh: 她要你们赶快结束这段青少年人生哲理戏 装备起来

translation.en: and meet her in the tech room. Immediately.
translation.zh: 去技术室找她 现在就去

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: [Allie] Bingo, we'll get you in through a back entrance.
translation.zh: 宾果 我们帮你从后门进入

translation.en: Once you're in and can determine where the bomb is,
translation.zh: 等你进去并找到炸弹在哪里

translation.en: Hammer will follow in, get the bomb,
translation.zh: 大锤随后进入 拿走炸弹

translation.en: and get it out of the building, where it can be properly disarmed.
translation.zh: 把它带出大楼带到可以妥善拆卸的地方去

translation.en: [Allie] Can you read me?
translation.zh: 能听到吗？

translation.en: [Lydia] Hammer down.
translation.zh: 大锤落地

translation.en: -[Emily] What does that mean? -It's lingo for "Yep."
translation.zh: -什么意思？-就是“是的”

translation.en: [Allie] Get into position by the door and wait for my signal.
translation.zh: 在门边就位 等我的信号

translation.en: This could take a while.
translation.zh: 特蕾西 可能不会速战速决

translation.en: Would you go get me more coffee? I wanna be alert.
translation.zh: 你能不能再给我来点咖啡？我想保持清醒

translation.en: [Lydia] You hearing music?
translation.zh: 你听见音乐声了吗？

translation.en: It's Seal. I programmed him into the suit.
translation.zh: 是席尔 我把他的歌置入我们的战衣了

translation.en: Em, we're on a mission here.
translation.zh: 艾米莉 我们在执行任务呢

translation.en: You think I don't know that?
translation.zh: 你以为我不知道吗？

translation.en: [Emily] There are thousands of lives in danger and we're stuck and I'm nervous.
translation.zh: 数千人的生命岌岌可危而我们被困在这里 我很紧张

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We have to succeed, Lydi.
translation.zh: 我们必须成功 莉迪亚

translation.en: This will give us the relaxed focus to finish the mission.
translation.zh: 这首歌可以帮我们放松集中精力完成任务

translation.en: What do I know? I'm nervous too.
translation.zh: 我怎么知道？我也紧张

translation.en: I do have to admit, the song's got a good hook.
translation.zh: 我得承认 这首歌还真拽耳朵

translation.en: Do you have eyes on them? Answer me.
translation.zh: 看见她们了吗？回答我

translation.en: Watch your mouth. You made a deal with The King, not with me.
translation.zh: 说话小心点 你和国王达成了一笔交易 不是和我

translation.en: They are on the loading dock on the south side of the building.
translation.zh: 她们在卸货区 大楼的南侧

translation.en: The next right. Other right.
translation.zh: 下一个口右转 右转

translation.en: Hurry up! They're not gonna stand there all night.
translation.zh: 快点！她们不会站一晚上

translation.en: Wow, you're bad.
translation.zh: 你是坏人

translation.en: Get away from the door, now!
translation.zh: 离开这扇门！

translation.en: -You okay? -Allie double-crossed us.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-艾丽出卖了我们

translation.en: The King paid her off. She was leading Laser right to you.
translation.zh: 国王收买了她 她把激光女引到你们所在的地方了

translation.en: Your singing sucks.
translation.zh: 你们唱得真难听

translation.en: You know, killing people is not a recognized hobby.
translation.zh: 杀人不算是个业余爱好

translation.en: I can't knit.
translation.zh: 我不会织毛衣

translation.en: Time to die!
translation.zh: 你死期到了！

translation.en: Time to take out the trash.
translation.zh: 清理垃圾时间到了

translation.en: -Holy crap! -Some people just deserve a dumpster.
translation.zh: -天呐！-有人只配进垃圾箱

translation.en: This was a set-up.
translation.zh: 这一切都是个陷阱

translation.en: Allie's knocked out. Security's on the way.
translation.zh: 艾丽被打晕了 保安马上到

translation.en: -I gotta come help. -It's not safe. Stay home.
translation.zh: -我得去帮你们-这里不安全 你留在家里

translation.en: I'm on my way.
translation.zh: 我这就来

translation.en: [Emily] Tracy?
translation.zh: 特蕾西？

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: Who's ready to hear from our next mayor?
translation.zh: 大家想不想听下一任市长讲话？

translation.en: I have a cold, a cold, that's why I'm not touching…
translation.zh: 我感冒了 所以我不想握手…

translation.en: Thank you. Well, thank you, Mr. King.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢你 王先生

translation.en: It's The-- It's "The" King.
translation.zh: 是“国王”

translation.en: It's "The" King. "King" is a dog's name. Okay?
translation.zh: 是“国王” 我不姓“王”好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Oh, is this…
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: Sorry. Crushin' it.
translation.zh: 对不起 胜券在握

translation.en: Is this thing… Can you… Okay. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这东西…能不能…好的 谢谢

translation.en: Have a good time.
translation.zh: 祝你开心

translation.en: -Thank you-- -It's gonna be a blast!
translation.zh: -谢谢-会有轰动效应的！

translation.en: This is an excellent example
translation.zh: 这是一个绝好的例证

translation.en: -of how together, we can revitalize… -Boom. …the city of Chicago.
translation.zh: 让我们看到我们可以如何振兴芝加哥

translation.en: Through collaboration and cooperation, we can…
translation.zh: 通过团结合作 我们可以…

translation.en: Use your big brain, Em. Where would he hide the bomb?
translation.zh: 开动你那智慧的大脑 艾米莉他会把炸弹藏在哪儿呢？

translation.en: The party's on the 30th floor, there'd be security there.
translation.zh: 派对在30楼 那里会有保安

translation.en: And the basement's so far away.
translation.zh: 地下室那么远

translation.en: But wait, Rachel Gonzales' campaign office is on the 29th floor.
translation.zh: 但等一下 瑞秋冈萨雷斯的竞选办公室在29层

translation.en: That's why he picked this building.
translation.zh: 所以他选了这个大楼

translation.en: -[ding] -Where the hell is Laser? She should be here by now.
translation.zh: 激光女哪儿去了？她该来了

translation.en: From where?
translation.zh: 她干什么去了？

translation.en: -From killing Thunder Force. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -去杀雷霆女神啊-哦

translation.en: She told me she's gonna make 'em into s'mores, which--
translation.zh: 她说要把她们变成烤棉花糖

translation.en: The timing is great because they're really startin' to bug me.
translation.zh: 时机正好因为我真的开始讨厌她们了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: You know, I don't really like this new "crab with a conscience" bit.
translation.zh: 你知道 我真的不喜欢这只“良心发现的螃蟹”

translation.en: I like my crab with a little hollandaise sauce, maybe a parsley garnish.
translation.zh: 我吃螃蟹喜欢蘸荷兰酱也许再撒点香菜

translation.en: We're good in that.
translation.zh: 我很同意

translation.en: Do we have a problem?
translation.zh: 有问题吗？

translation.en: We don't have a problem. All is good. Let's slaughter them all.
translation.zh: 没问题 一切好极了我们把她们都杀光

translation.en: Kill those sons of bitches…
translation.zh: 干掉那些混蛋…

translation.en: [wheezing] Thanks for the help.
translation.zh: 谢谢你帮忙

translation.en: -Kenny, call her. -You've killed Kenny.
translation.zh: -肯尼 给她打电话-你杀死了肯尼

translation.en: I… I did?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -Who's left? -Andrew's left.
translation.zh: -剩下的还有谁？-还有安德鲁

translation.en: Yeah, I can call, sir.
translation.zh: 对 我可以打电话 先生

translation.en: -Fine. -Oh, ca-- Okay, yeah. Sorry.
translation.zh: -好啊-给…好的 不好意思

translation.en: Uh, Laser, do you copy?
translation.zh: 激光女 听到了吗？

translation.en: -[Andrew] Do you copy? -Yeah, kind of.
translation.zh: -听到了吗？-差不多吧

translation.en: -What's she saying? -Hmm?
translation.zh: 她说什么？

translation.en: -The red-head threw a dumpster. -A red-head threw a dumpster at her.
translation.zh: -红头发的那个用垃圾箱砸我-红头发的那个用垃圾箱砸她

translation.en: What? Well, did they get away? Where… where are they?
translation.zh: 什么？她们跑了？她们在哪儿？

translation.en: -Put her on speaker phone! -Andrew, you idiot!
translation.zh: -打开免提！-安德鲁 你这个白痴！

translation.en: -Laser, where are they? -No idea. Probably going after the bomb.
translation.zh: -激光女 她们在哪儿？-不知道 可能去找炸弹了

translation.en: After all that.
translation.zh: 我们费了这么大劲

translation.en: -Hang up, you stupid… -Down! Hang it up! Moron!
translation.zh: -挂了吧 你这傻瓜-手放下！挂断！白痴！

translation.en: We gotta go back up. Let's end this. Hit 29.
translation.zh: 我们回楼上去 了结这件事 按29层

translation.en: Ah, so close.
translation.zh: 就差一点

translation.en: -Twenty-- -I know, they're not made for, um…
translation.zh: -二十…-我知道 这些按钮不是为…

translation.en: -It'll take us a while. Okay. -Twenty-nine! I'm surrounded by idiots.
translation.zh: -会花一些时间 但是… 好吧-29！我周围一群白痴

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: If you were a narcissistic megalomaniac, where would you hide a bomb?
translation.zh: 如果你是个自恋狂人你会把炸弹藏在哪儿？

translation.en: My guess is a place of power. Her office, maybe.
translation.zh: 我猜是在一个权力集中的地方也许在她办公室

translation.en: [The King] Well, well…
translation.zh: 哼哼…

translation.en: Evening, ladies. I'm assuming you're both here.
translation.zh: 晚上好 女士们 我猜你们俩都在这儿

translation.en: I gotta tell you,
translation.zh: 我得说

translation.en: -I'm bummed you're not dead. -I'm sorry to disappoint you, King.
translation.zh: -你们没死我很失望-对不起 让你失望了 王

translation.en: Okay, it's "The" King. Okay?
translation.zh: 我叫“国王” 好吗？

translation.en: "The King!" It's three letters! Why doesn't anybody get this?
translation.zh: “国王”！一共两个字！ 人们怎么就说不对呢？

translation.en: -It's not tough. -"The King." Like, "The Boss."
translation.zh: -不难-“国王” 就像“老板”

translation.en: You on my left?
translation.zh: 你在我左边吗？

translation.en: [The King] "The man."
translation.zh: -“老大”-对

translation.en: -"The bomb." -Nice, sir.
translation.zh: -“炸弹”-更好

translation.en: [The King] Thanks. The big, beautiful bomb.
translation.zh: 谢谢 那枚巨大的漂亮的炸弹

translation.en: You didn't think I was gonna let nagging chicks
translation.zh: 你们不会认为我会让两个讨厌的女人

translation.en: get their hands on my big, beautiful bomb, did you?
translation.zh: 把我那巨大的漂亮的炸弹搞到手吧？

translation.en: You know what they say about men who claim to have big, big bombs.
translation.zh: 你知道 人们说凡是声称自己的炸弹很大的男人

translation.en: Little, tiny fuses.
translation.zh: 他们的导火索都很细小

translation.en: Ladies, meet the henchmen.
translation.zh: 女士们 认识一下我的手下人

translation.en: Hi, I'm Andy or Andrew. Either one.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是安迪 或安德鲁 都行

translation.en: Who was that? Was that Andrew?
translation.zh: 那是谁？是安德鲁吗？

translation.en: [The Crab] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Damn it! I wanted to kill Andrew.
translation.zh: 该死的！我想亲手杀死安德鲁的

translation.en: Enough with the bullets.
translation.zh: 射击到此为止

translation.en: Come on, Thunder Force. I'm ready to get my hands dirty.
translation.zh: 来吧 雷霆女神 我亲手解决你们

translation.en: Of course. He's a Miscreant, too.
translation.zh: 当然 他也是恶徒

translation.en: I thought you were just run-of-the-mill dirtbag, but you're a Miscreant dirtbag.
translation.zh: 我以为你是个普通的坏蛋但你是个转基因坏蛋

translation.en: You buried the lead on that one, Jerry.
translation.zh: 这么重要的信息你却没说 杰瑞

translation.en: -You're a waste of butter, Crab. -I didn't grab the butter.
translation.zh: -你浪费了黄油 螃蟹-我没动那黄油

translation.en: I got a job to do, so let's get this over with.
translation.zh: 我还有正事呢 所以我们速战速决吧

translation.en: -Yeah. -Let's dance, dummy.
translation.zh: -好-我们跳舞吧 蠢货

translation.en: He's stronger than I thought…
translation.zh: 他比我想象的有劲…

translation.en: File you under "trash!"
translation.zh: 你应该和“垃圾”归为一类！

translation.en: She's got a real sexy violent streak.
translation.zh: 她有种性感的暴力之美

translation.en: What's the matter? Cat got your tongue? Enjoy the ride!
translation.zh: 怎么了？哑巴了？旅途愉快！

translation.en: Lydi!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！

translation.en: Peekaboo.
translation.zh: 出来吧

translation.en: Lydi!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: I have this signature move. It's kind of a hug-of-death thing.
translation.zh: 我有个招牌动作 是一种死亡拥抱

translation.en: -[grunts] -You're gonna love it.
translation.zh: 你会喜欢的

translation.en: -What's that smell? -It's the suits, we can't wash them.
translation.zh: -这是什么味儿？-是战衣的味儿 没法洗

translation.en: Terrible!
translation.zh: 真臭！

translation.en: This is set to extra-crispy, you donut hole.
translation.zh: 我设在了高档 你这个人渣

translation.en: Bye-bye, nerd!
translation.zh: 再见了 书呆子！

translation.en: She's not a nerd. She's smart.
translation.zh: 她不是书呆子 她很聪明

translation.en: There's a difference.
translation.zh: 二者有区别

translation.en: Tracy, what have you done?
translation.zh: 特蕾西 你干了什么？

translation.en: What I had to do, Mom.
translation.zh: 我不得不这么做 妈妈

translation.en: "Mom"?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: You mean, I get a crack at a family kill?
translation.zh: 你是说 我有机会杀掉一家人？

translation.en: You hardly ever get that chance.
translation.zh: 这样的机会太难得了

translation.en: But first, you.
translation.zh: 但我要先杀你

translation.en: Pretty strong for a girl,
translation.zh: 作为一个女的 你很强壮

translation.en: but not strong enough.
translation.zh: 但还不够强

translation.en: Hands off.
translation.zh: 把手拿开

translation.en: Jerry…
translation.zh: 杰瑞…

translation.en: No problem.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: -Mother-- -Traitor!
translation.zh: -妈…-叛徒！

translation.en: Bottom feeder!
translation.zh: 小虾米！

translation.en: -Batter up, King! -It's "The" Ki--
translation.zh: -击球手就位 王！-我叫国…

translation.en: That one's outta the park!
translation.zh: 击出了球场！

translation.en: I wish you hadn't done that. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 我真希望你没有这么做 你没事吧？

translation.en: -You guys needed help. -Jerry, you good?
translation.zh: -你们需要支援-杰瑞 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah, good.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Where's the bomb?
translation.zh: 炸弹在哪儿？

translation.en: -Corner office. -Got it.
translation.zh: -拐角办公室-明白了

translation.en: Love an ambulance.
translation.zh: 我需要救护车

translation.en: Or a vet, you know?
translation.zh: 或者是兽医

translation.en: Marine biologist…
translation.zh: 海洋生物学家…

translation.en: Somebody's an overachiever.
translation.zh: 这是要炸平一座山吗？

translation.en: Can you disarm it?
translation.zh: 你能拆掉吗？

translation.en: Not with the time we have left. It'll have trip wires all over it.
translation.zh: 时间不够了 布满了引爆线 我会触发炸弹的

translation.en: I could set it off.
translation.zh: 布满了引爆线 我会触发炸弹的

translation.en: [exhales] Good to know.
translation.zh: 好消息

translation.en: -Well, let me try. Maybe it'll work. -No, no, I can do it.
translation.zh: -我试试吧 也许能行-不 我可以做到

translation.en: I'm super-fast now. I can just run it out of town.
translation.zh: 我非常快 我可以带上它跑到城外

translation.en: Look, we don't know how stable it'll be with your speed.
translation.zh: 我们不知道 在你这么快的速度下它是否稳定

translation.en: You've already saved us once today. Your grandparents would be so proud.
translation.zh: 今天你已经救我们一次了你的外公外婆会为你骄傲的

translation.en: But if you think I'm gonna let you touch that bomb, you're out of your mind.
translation.zh: 但如果你认为我会让你动那颗炸弹那你就是疯了

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Don't do anything crazy.
translation.zh: 别做疯狂的事

translation.en: Nah. I've actually thought this one through.
translation.zh: 其实 这一次我想好了

translation.en: First time for everything.
translation.zh: 破天荒第一次

translation.en: No, Lydia.
translation.zh: 不 莉迪亚

translation.en: I can't toss it out the window, people could get hurt.
translation.zh: 我不能把它扔出窗户了事可能有人会受伤

translation.en: You know my body can take the impact.
translation.zh: 你知道我的身体能承受爆炸的冲击

translation.en: I know we don't have a lot of time, so let me say this.
translation.zh: 我们的时间不多了 所以请让我说完

translation.en: If this goes bad, I wanna thank you for being my friend.
translation.zh: 如果出现意外我只想感谢你做我的朋友

translation.en: You know, people wondered why we were friends
translation.zh: 你知道 人们总是不明白我们怎么会是朋友 因为我们

translation.en: 'cause we're nothing alike,
translation.zh: 你知道 人们总是不明白我们怎么会是朋友 因为我们 毫无共同点但我一直相信你会改变世界

translation.en: but I always knew you were gonna change the world.
translation.zh: 毫无共同点但我一直相信你会改变世界

translation.en: You're the best person I ever met.
translation.zh: 你是我见过的最好的人

translation.en: Till I met your kid.
translation.zh: 除了你女儿之外

translation.en: Listen to what your mom says.
translation.zh: 听妈妈的话

translation.en: I wish I always had.
translation.zh: 真希望我听了我妈妈的话

translation.en: [stifles sob] I should go.
translation.zh: 我该走了

translation.en: If the bomb explodes and we're just standing here, that'd be weird.
translation.zh: 如果炸弹爆炸 而我们就这么站着那就太奇怪了

translation.en: Lydi…
translation.zh: 莉迪亚

translation.en: Lydi!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！

translation.en: [Emily] Lydia!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！

translation.en: No…
translation.zh: 不…

translation.en: Oh, no, no… stop! Stop!
translation.zh: 不…别动！

translation.en: Lydi?
translation.zh: 莉迪亚？

translation.en: -Oh, no! Lydia! -Lydia? Oh my god…
translation.zh: -哦不！莉迪亚！-莉迪亚？天呐…

translation.en: [Emily] Lydi…
translation.zh: 莉迪亚…

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 哦 对不起

translation.en: I barfed river water on you.
translation.zh: 我把河水吐了你一身

translation.en: That was so much.
translation.zh: 吐了这么多

translation.en: I really, really, really love this suit.
translation.zh: 我真的好爱这身战衣

translation.en: I really love it, and I don't even care if it's stinky anymore.
translation.zh: 我真的好爱它 哪怕臭烘烘的我也不在乎

translation.en: -[Tracy laughs] -We're just so happy you're alive.
translation.zh: 你活着 我们太高兴了

translation.en: -I love you guys. -We love you, honey.
translation.zh: -我爱你们-我们爱你 亲爱的

translation.en: -Help her up. -Oh god, help a girl up!
translation.zh: -帮她起来-哎哟 帮我起来

translation.en: Quite a reaction.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮

translation.en: Thunder Force, I wanna thank you,
translation.zh: 雷霆女神 我想感谢你们

translation.en: and the city of Chicago wants to thank you for your tremendous bravery.
translation.zh: 整个芝加哥都想为你们的勇敢向你们表示感谢

translation.en: -Thank you, Mayor. -Yes.
translation.zh: -谢谢 市长-是的

translation.en: Where's The King?
translation.zh: 国王在哪儿？

translation.en: In custody. Alive.
translation.zh: 被抓住了 还活着

translation.en: You did it, Em.
translation.zh: 你成功了 艾米莉

translation.en: You brought a Miscreant to justice.
translation.zh: 你把一个恶徒绳之以法了

translation.en: You finished the work your parents started.
translation.zh: 你完成了你父母未完成的事业

translation.en: -What about Laser? -We're still lookin'.
translation.zh: -激光女呢？-我们还在找她

translation.en: When you catch her, and before she goes to prison,
translation.zh: 等你们抓住她 把她送进监狱之前

translation.en: can I have a couple minutes? I wanna cut that ponytail off.
translation.zh: 我能不能见见她？我想把她的马尾辫剪掉

translation.en: Is that a Samson and Delilah thing?
translation.zh: 你以为她的超能力来自头发？

translation.en: I just think she'll look really dumb with the short hai-- [retches]
translation.zh: 我只是觉得 她留短头发会很傻

translation.en: Okay, I think I'm done.
translation.zh: 好 应该吐干净了

translation.en: May I empty your shoes?
translation.zh: 我帮你把鞋倒干净好吗？

translation.en: -No, no, no, they're fine. -Okay, sorry.
translation.zh: -不用 没关系-好的 对不起

translation.en: I just-- This might be an awkward time to ask you,
translation.zh: 我只是…现在可能不是时候

translation.en: but I wonder
translation.zh: 但我想问你们

translation.en: if your team would like to make an official arrangement with the city.
translation.zh: 你们的团队是否愿意正式与市政府合作？

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Right?
translation.zh: 好啊 是不是？

translation.en: -Oh, that we would. -Perfect.
translation.zh: -我们愿意-好极了

translation.en: -The press is ready for a statement. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -记者准备好听我们发表声明了-谢谢

translation.en: Ladies. Thank you.
translation.zh: 女士们 谢谢

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Thank you, Mayor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 市长

translation.en: I'll drive us home.
translation.zh: 我开车带你们回家

translation.en: You have to sit on my lap or get in the trunk.
translation.zh: 你坐我腿上 还是坐后备箱里？

translation.en: Oh. Psh. I'll race you home.
translation.zh: 我和你们赛跑

translation.en: -Why can't I drive? -They just pulled you out of a river.
translation.zh: -怎么不能让我开车？-他们刚把你从河里捞上来

translation.en: Last time I got pulled out of the river, I drove right away.
translation.zh: 上一次我被人从河里捞上来我马上就开车了

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Thunder Force!
translation.zh: 雷霆女神！

translation.en: [continuing chanting] Thunder Force!
translation.zh: 雷霆女神！

translation.en: What? What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: We got you, Chicago!
translation.zh: 芝加哥 我们挺你！

translation.en: You remembered.
translation.zh: 你没忘

translation.en: Pretty romantic. Look at that.
translation.zh: 好浪漫啊 看

translation.en: Look at you get after it.
translation.zh: 真豪迈

translation.en: Let me at least… feed you.
translation.zh: 至少让我喂你一块

translation.en: -Thank you. -Come on. Knock-knock.
translation.zh: -谢谢-来 张嘴

translation.en: That's a good girl. Right down the hatch.
translation.zh: 好孩子 都吃下去

translation.en: Oh god…
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: Make room for more.
translation.zh: 留着点肚子 还有更多呢

translation.en: Oh, my turn? Oh, mmm.
translation.zh: 该我了？

translation.en: Or our turn.
translation.zh: 该我们了

translation.en: Yeah. Oh? Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: [chanting] Thunder Force! Thunder Force! Thunder Force! Thunder Force!
